[{"T":"n","id":32914612,"headline":"Secret \u0026#39;Elon Mode\u0026#39; Allows Tesla Self-Driving Cars To Go Hands-Off, Hacker Says","summary":"Renowned Tesla hacker GreenTheOnly, known for unraveling Tesla\u0026#39;s hidden secrets, has once again sent ripples through the Tesla community.","author":"Benzinga EV Insights","created_at":"2023-06-19T19:57:29Z","updated_at":"2023-06-19T19:57:30Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/top-stories/23/06/32914612/secret-elon-mode-allows-tesla-self-driving-cars-to-go-hands-off-hacker-says","content":"\u003cp\u003eRenowned Tesla hacker GreenTheOnly, known for unraveling \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/amp/content/30001659\"\u003eTesla\u0026#39;s hidden secrets\u003c/a\u003e, has once again sent ripples through the Tesla community.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eA recent revelation on Twitter unveiled a hidden feature named \u0026#39;Elon Mode\u0026#39; nestled within Tesla\u0026#39;s Full Self-Driving (FSD) Beta software, as shared by \u003ca href=\"https://www.notateslaapp.com/software-updates/upcoming-features/id/1485/tesla-s-hidden-elon-mode-unveiled-a-sneak-peek-into-the-future-of-fsd-video\"\u003eNotATeslaApp\u003c/a\u003e.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cblockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\"\u003e\r\n\u003cp\u003eImpressions after nearly 600 miles on 11.4.3 with Elon mode (could not get a non-Tesla car to try in time).\u003cbr /\u003e\r\nIt went much better than the prior experiment obviously.\u003cbr /\u003e\r\nMany contributing factors. I was not as late so I did not mind as much (still ended up 5 minutes late solely\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u0026mdash; green (@greentheonly) \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/greentheonly/status/1669907195683643392?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\"\u003eJune 17, 2023\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/blockquote\u003e\r\n\u003cscript async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"\u003e\u003c/script\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIn a series of tweets, GreenTheOnly provided insights into this unreleased feature, presenting an intriguing tweak in Tesla\u0026#39;s \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32828958/fix-no-fix-tesla-user-tells-elon-musk-fsd-beta-upgrade-did-not-help-his-woes\"\u003eFSD Beta\u0026#39;s\u003c/a\u003e driver monitoring system.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eTesla\u0026#39;s Driver Monitoring System (DMS) is known for its \u0026quot;nag\u0026quot;\u0026nbsp;feature, which prompts drivers to maintain their focus on the road by applying pressure to the steering wheel. The so-called \u0026quot;Elon Mode\u0026quot; takes away this need.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eElon Mode, not currently available to the public, turns off \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32707532/safety-over-comfort-as-far-as-fsd-beta-is-concerned-says-elon-musk\"\u003esteering wheel prompts\u003c/a\u003e and relies solely on utilizing the internal camera to monitor the driver and ensure they are not distracted. Normally, both the interior camera and steering wheel input are monitored and required by the driver.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eSharing his personal experience with Elon Mode over a 600-mile\u0026nbsp;journey, Green painted a picture of a ride free of the alerts that are now required in addition to\u0026nbsp;Tesla\u0026#39;s vision-based driver monitoring.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eHe noted that while the car still made some strange moves that he didn\u0026#39;t enjoy, he didn\u0026#39;t mind as much since the car was not begging him to\u0026nbsp;hold onto the wheel.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003ePhoto courtesy of Tesla.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n","symbols":["TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":32916953,"headline":"Tesla Megapack To Help Power Western Australia\u0026#39;s Transition From Coal To Clean Energy","summary":" ","author":"Anan Ashraf","created_at":"2023-06-20T07:39:24Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T07:39:25Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32916953/tesla-megapack-to-help-power-western-australias-transition-from-coal-to-clean-energy","content":"\u003cp\u003eFrench renewable company\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eNeoen SA\u003c/strong\u003e (OTCGM: NOSPF) said on Monday that it has notified EV giant \u003cstrong\u003eTesla Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSLA#NASDAQ\"\u003eTSLA\u003c/a\u003e) to start making megapack units. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat Happened:\u003c/strong\u003e Neoen won a services contract from the Australia Energy Market Operator (AEMO) to provide 197 MW of storage capacity for 4 hours. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe service will be provided by Stage 1 of Collie Battery sized at 219 MW / 877 MWh and consisting of 224 Tesla Megapack 2XL units, the company said in a statement. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe battery will be located near the town of Collie in Western Australia and is expected to be operational in Q4 2024. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe AEMO services contract will run for two years starting Oct. 1, 2024. The contract is part of AEMO\u0026#8217;s intent to utilize rooftop solar in Western Australia given the retirement of coal power plants. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\"As Western Australia's major electricity system transitions away from coal-fired generation, critical investments are needed in low-cost renewable energy backed by firming generation, such as batteries and gas, and augmentation of the transmission network,\u0026#8221; AEMO CEO \u003cstrong\u003eDaniel Westerman\u003c/strong\u003e said. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eNeoen\u0026#8217;s collie battery will provide energy security during the transition to renewables, he added. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhy It Matters:\u003c/strong\u003e  The Megapack is a \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/04/31709884/tesla-showcases-megapack-battery-installation-paid-for-by-apple\"\u003ebattery that can store over 3MWh of energy\u003c/a\u003e or enough to power an average of 3,600 homes for one hour. They are \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/21/09/23127011/tesla-said-to-implement-changes-to-megapack-firmware-for-victoria-project-after-fire-testing-resumes\"\u003ealso part of Victoria Big Battery\u003c/a\u003e — a 212-unit, 350 MW system — providing backup protection to Victoria in Australia. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eTesla's energy and storage business reported revenue of $1,529 million in the first quarter, up from $616 million in the year-ago period.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eIn 2017, Tesla completed installing the \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/17/11/10832383/tesla-successfully-builds-largest-lithium-ion-battery-in-australia\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003eworld\u0026#8217;s largest lithium-ion battery\u003c/a\u003e in South Australia, with the company\u0026#8217;s power packs installed at a wind farm owned by Neoen.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eCheck out more of Benzinga's Future Of Mobility coverage by\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/topic/mobility\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003e\u003cem\u003efollowing this link\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003cem\u003e.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead More:\u003c/em\u003e \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32916334/polestar-joins-forces-with-sister-company-for-china-ev-market-dominance\"\u003e\u003cem\u003ePolestar Joins Forces With Sister Company For China EV Market Dominance\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003ePhoto courtesy: Tesla\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["NOSPF","TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]
[{"T":"n","id":32917114,"headline":"This Android Malware Is Back To Steal WhatsApp Backups: Here\u0026#39;s How To Stay Safe","summary":"Android malware GravityRAT is targeting unsuspecting users and stealing the WhatsApp backup files stored on their phones.","author":"Rounak Jain","created_at":"2023-06-20T08:08:59Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T08:09:00Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32917114/this-android-malware-is-back-to-steal-whatsapp-backups-heres-how-to-stay-safe","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhatsApp\u003c/strong\u003e users using \u003cstrong\u003eAndroid smartphones\u003c/strong\u003e have one more security concern to deal with. Android malware \u003cstrong\u003eGravityRAT\u003c/strong\u003e is back and is now targeting the \u003cstrong\u003eMeta Platforms Inc.-owned (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/META#NASDAQ\"\u003eMETA\u003c/a\u003e)\u003c/strong\u003e WhatsApp's backup files from unsuspecting users' phones.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat Happened:\u003c/strong\u003e An updated version of notorious Android malware GravityRAT is now out in the open, targeting unsuspecting users and stealing the WhatsApp backup files stored on their phones.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eSee Also: \u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32912056/how-to-generate-instagram-post-backgrounds-using-midjourney\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eHow To Generate Instagram Post Backgrounds Using Midjourney\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eGravityRAT is a trojan that first surfaced in 2015. According to Facebook researchers, a Pakistan-based group named SpaceCobra is suspected to be behind this malware. Since August 2022, it has been distributed via two other messaging applications: \u003cstrong\u003eBingeChat and Chatico\u003c/strong\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhy Is It Important:\u003c/strong\u003e GravityRAT is a remote access trojan. As the name suggests, it provides remote access to hackers, allowing them to access and exfiltrate sensitive information like call logs, contacts, messages, locations, photos, videos, and even documents.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eIn this instance, GravityRAT extracts WhatsApp backup files and if they are not end-to-end encrypted, they can be easily extracted to get complete access to all the messages, photos, videos, documents, and other media items stored in the backup file.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eHow To Stay Safe:\u003c/strong\u003e When it comes to staying safe from malware on Android, the best solution is not to sideload applications, especially those from non-reputable sources.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eWhile \u003cstrong\u003eAlphabet Inc.'s (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GOOGL#NASDAQ\"\u003eGOOGL\u003c/a\u003e) Google\u003c/strong\u003e has the \u003cstrong\u003ePlay Protect\u003c/strong\u003e safety feature built into Android, it is not a full-proof solution, and users should download apps from the \u003cstrong\u003ePlay Store\u003c/strong\u003e to remain safe.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAdditionally, WhatsApp also has the option to enable \u003cstrong\u003eend-to-end encryption\u003c/strong\u003e on backups. This prevents even Google and WhatsApp from decoding what is stored in those backup files, so it adds a layer of protection.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eCheck out more of Benzinga's Consumer Tech coverage by\u003c/em\u003e \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/topic/consumer-tech\"\u003e\u003cem\u003efollowing this link\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003cem\u003e.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next: \u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32912951/want-a-personalized-ai-googles-project-tailwind-to-open-early-access-to-ai-notebook-soon\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eWant A Personalized AI? Google\u0026#8217;s Project Tailwind To Open Early Access To AI Notebook Soon\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["GOOGL","META"],"source":"benzinga"}]

(NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GM#NYSE\"\u003eGM\u003c/a\u003e) Chevrolet with a 7.1% market share, and Ford with 4.9%, as per the report.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhy It Matters\u003c/strong\u003e: The Model Y\u0026nbsp;\u003ca target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/05/32608286/the-tesla-model-y-is-now-the-worlds-bestselling-car\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003emade global waves\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;in the first quarter, surpassing\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eToyota\u0026#8217;s\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;RAV4 and Corolla models to secure the top spot in global sales rankings, according to data from Jato Dynamics.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eWith 267,200 units sold worldwide, the Model Y outperformed the 256,400 Corolla units and 214,700 RAV4 units sold during the same period.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAlthough Tesla CEO\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eElon Musk\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026#8216;s prediction of the Model Y becoming the world\u0026#8217;s best-selling vehicle by 2022 didn\u0026#8217;t materialize, it still made a strong impression, ranking as the\u0026nbsp;\u003ca target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/01/30337806/tesla-had-a-top-10-selling-vehicle-in-the-us-for-2022-what-it-means-and-whats-next-for-2023\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003esixth best-selling vehicle\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;in the U.S. last year.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eFurthermore, last week Tesla\u0026nbsp;\u003ca target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32849107/tesla-hikes-model-y-awd-price-again-heres-how-much-it-costs-now\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003eraised the prices\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;of its Model Y AWD by $250 in the United States. [{"T":"n","id":32917787,"headline":"How To Silence WhatsApp Calls From Unknown Numbers","summary":"WhatsApp announced a new feature on Tuesday that automatically mutes incoming calls from unknown or unsaved numbers. This comes as a part of new privacy features announced by \u003cstrong\u003eMeta Platforms Inc.\u003c/strong\u003e-owned\u003cstrong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/META#NASDAQ\"\u003eMETA\u003c/a\u003e)\u003c/strong\u003e after recent reports of increasing spam calls.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eHow To Use It:\u003c/strong\u003e To access this setting, users need to go to the \u003cstrong\u003e\u0026#8216;Privacy\u0026#8217; section\u003c/strong\u003e in WhatsApp settings, select \u003cstrong\u003e\u0026#8216;Calls,\u0026#8217;\u003c/strong\u003e and activate the \u003cstrong\u003e\u0026#8216;Silence Unknown Callers\u0026#8217;\u003c/strong\u003e toggle. This feature aims to help users avoid spam, scams, and unwanted calls from strangers, enhancing their overall protection.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eSee Also: \u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32910687/this-new-whatsapp-feature-makes-it-easier-to-manage-and-view-communities-heres-how-to-use-it\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eThis New WhatsApp Feature Makes It Easier To Manage And View Communities: Here\u0026#8217;s How To Use It\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eOnce activated, the feature completely mutes any indication of incoming calls from unknown numbers, including auditory and visual notifications within the app. Note that these muted calls do not go unrecorded; they are listed in the recent calls log, tagged as \u0026#8220;silenced unknown caller,\u0026#8221; so users can return the call if they wish.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThis feature was introduced following a surge in spam calls, which were especially troubling for users in India. TechCrunch \u003ca href=\"https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/11/whatsapp-spam-calls-india/\"\u003ereported\u003c/a\u003e last month that WhatsApp deployed a machine learning-based enforcement system that reduced spam calls by 50%. Now, the new silencing feature provides another line of defense for users against spam calls that bypass the service\u0026#8217;s automatic filters.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eWhatsApp is also incorporating a new feature called \u003cstrong\u003e‘Privacy Checkup.'\u003c/strong\u003e This step-by-step guide educates users about the privacy and security options offered by the app. It allows users to decide who can contact them. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAlso, it assists them in adding extra layers of security to their account, such as two-step verification and biometric authentication requirements to open the app.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eCheck out more of Benzinga\u0026#8217;s Consumer Tech coverage by\u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/topic/consumer-tech\"\u003e\u003cem\u003e following this link\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003cem\u003e.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next:\u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32917114/this-android-malware-is-back-to-steal-whatsapp-backups-heres-how-to-stay-safe\"\u003e\u003cem\u003e This Android Malware Is Back To Steal WhatsApp Backups: Here\u0026#8217;s How To Stay Safe\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["META"],"source":"benzinga"}]

The stock has shown a similar pattern in the previous week and has experienced a notable 38% rally in the past month.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eAlso Read:\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003e\u003ca target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/money/everything-you-need-to-know-about-tesla-stock\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eEverything You Need to Know About Tesla Stock\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eHowever, the bond market\u0026#8217;s growing pessimism ahead of key events poses a potential hurdle to the stock\u0026#8217;s rally. The upcoming testimony of \u003cstrong\u003eFederal Reserve\u003c/strong\u003e Chair \u003cstrong\u003eJerome Powell\u003c/strong\u003e before Congress and the Bank of England\u0026#8217;s \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32916660/fed-pause-aside-global-bond-sell-off-ahead-of-powell-testimony-put-pressure-on-treasuries-are-rate-h\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003emonetary policy decision\u003c/a\u003e are factors to watch. Let\u0026#8217;s examine how options traders are considering crucial trading levels for Tesla stock this week:\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003col\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eResistance\u003c/strong\u003e: Tesla closed at $260.54 on Friday. Options expiring this Friday show relatively higher open interest at three levels. The $260 Call strike exhibits notable open interest, suggesting it could act as a resistance if the stock experiences a correction. If Tesla maintains its upward momentum, the $280 and $300 levels could then become significant resistance levels.\u003c/li\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eSupport\u003c/strong\u003e: On the downside, there is relatively higher open interest at the $250 Put strike, indicating that traders may not anticipate the stock to drop below this level in the event of a correction.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ol\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eIt\u0026#8217;s important to note that open interest figures provide a general indication of support and resistance. Significant stock price movements or macro events can lead to substantial\u0026nbsp;\u003ca target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32888907/s-p-500-as-index-hits-14-month-high-find-out-crucial-trading-levels-priced-in-by-options-market\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003eshifts in open interest\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;numbers.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32915847/imf-md-says-agency-working-on-concept-of-global-central-bank-digital-currency-platform-that-will-lin\"\u003eIMF MD Says Agency Working On Concept Of Global Central Bank Digital Currency Platform That Will Link Nations\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]
[{"T":"n","id":32918479,"headline":"Nvidia AI Chips Getting Sold In China\u0026#39;s Underground Market Amid US Sanctions: Reuters","summary":" ","author":"Benzinga Newsbot","created_at":"2023-06-20T10:38:23Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T10:38:24Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32918479/nvidia-ai-chips-getting-sold-in-chinas-underground-market-amid-us-sanctions-reuters","content":"\u003cp\u003eDespite U.S. sanctions, high-end \u003cstrong\u003eNvidia\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eCorp.\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/NVDA#NASDAQ\"\u003eNVDA\u003c/a\u003e) AI chips are being sold in China\u0026#8217;s underground market, Reuters reports.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eUnderground Market\u003c/strong\u003e: At the Huaqiangbei electronics area in Shenzhen, vendors discreetly offer Nvidia\u0026#8217;s A100 artificial intelligence chips for $20,000 apiece, double the usual price. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe U.S. export restrictions have created a de facto underground market, with vendors keen to avoid scrutiny from both U.S. and Chinese authorities.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eImpact of Sanctions\u003c/strong\u003e: \u003cstrong\u003ePresident Joe Biden\u0026#8217;s\u003c/strong\u003e administration ordered Nvidia to stop exporting its two most advanced chips, the A100 and the recently developed H100, to mainland China and Hong Kong in September. This was part of efforts to stymie Chinese AI and supercomputing development amid intensifying political and trade tensions.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eHigh Demand\u003c/strong\u003e: Despite the sanctions, demand for high-end chips has skyrocketed, particularly for Nvidia\u0026#8217;s microprocessors, which are widely regarded as the best at handling machine-learning tasks. Buyers typically include app developers, startups, researchers, gamers, and even local Chinese authorities.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eResponse from Nvidia and U.S. Department of Commerce\u003c/strong\u003e: Nvidia stated that it did not allow exports of the A100 or H100 to China and would take immediate action if a customer was found to be breaching their agreement. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe U.S. Department of Commerce stated that export control measures have had a \u0026#8220;substantial impact\u0026#8221; on China\u0026#8217;s availability of high-end chips and that \u0026#8220;allegations of violations are investigated\u0026#8221;.\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["NVDA"],"source":"benzinga"}]

However, the benchmark index still recorded weekly gain, also notching the fifth positive week in a row.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eWall Street analysts make new stock picks on a daily basis. Unfortunately for investors, not all analysts have particularly impressive track records at predicting market movements. Even when it comes to one single stock, analyst ratings and price targets can vary widely, leaving investors confused about which analyst\u0026#39;s opinion to \u003ca href='https://www.benzinga.com/money/setting-up-a-trust/'\u003etrust\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eBenzinga\u0026#39;s Analyst Ratings API is a collection of the highest-quality stock ratings curated by the Benzinga news desk via direct partnerships with major sell-side banks. Benzinga displays overnight ratings changes on a daily basis three hours prior to the U.S. equity market opening. Data specialists at investment dashboard provider Toggle.ai recently uncovered that the analyst insights Benzinga Pro subscribers and Benzinga readers regularly receive can successfully be used as trading indicators to outperform the stock market.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTop Analyst Picks:\u003c/strong\u003e Fortunately, any Benzinga reader can access the latest analyst ratings on the \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/22/09/28888638/exclusive-study-finds-benzinga-analyst-ratings-data-yields-market-beating-strategie\"\u003e\u003cem\u003e Analyst Stock Ratings \u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e page. [{"T":"n","id":32921000,"headline":"Wearable Devices Launches New Mudra Band Application On The Apple App Store And Adds A Custom Designed Apple Watch Face For Mudra Band Users","summary":"Wearable Devices Ltd. (NASDAQ:WLDS, WLDSW)))) (\u0026#34;Wearable Devices\u0026#34; or the \u0026#34;Company\u0026#34;), a technology growth company specializing in AI-powered touchless sensing wearables, is excited to announce that the","author":"Happy Mohamed","created_at":"2023-06-20T12:12:46Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T12:12:47Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32921000/wearable-devices-launches-new-mudra-band-application-on-the-apple-app-store-and-adds-a-custom-design","content":"\u003cp\u003eWearable Devices Ltd. (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/WLDS#NASDAQ\"\u003eWLDS\u003c/a\u003e, WLDSW))))) (\u0026quot;Wearable Devices\u0026quot; or the \u0026quot;Company\u0026quot;), a technology growth company specializing in AI-powered touchless sensing wearables, is excited to announce that the new Mudra Band application is now available in the Apple App Store. The Company also added an exclusive custom-designed Apple Watch Face for Mudra Band users.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Company\u0026#39;s flagship product, the Mudra Band for Apple Watch, uses neural signals from the wrist to translate user intent to input touchless commands for Apple ecosystem devices. The Mudra Band\u0026#39;s Air-Touch functionality enables the use of subtle finger movements for point, click, and drag and drop commands. These natural and familiar gestures are used for tap to select, pinch to scroll, swipe, hold, and navigate to any area of interest using gestures in a relaxed spatial body posture.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Air-Touch functionality also supports a seamless switch and toggle of input between Apple products \u0026ndash; spanning across iPhones, iPads, Mac computers, Apple TVs, and additional devices such as augmented reality (AR) smart glasses, extended reality headsets, and mobile gaming devices. The new Mudra Watch Face provides quick and convenient and effortless control switch between the user\u0026#39;s iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, and Mac computer, directly from their Apple Watch.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eA major new feature in the Mudra Band application is displaying Surface Neural Conductance (SNC) signal patterns of the user\u0026#39;s ulnar, median and radial wrist nerve bundles, live and in real-time. Observing neural signals provides a plethora of insight into the mind-body connection, revealing the intricate interplay between thoughts, emotions, and physiological responses, deepening our understanding of brain-body communication.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eReal-time monitoring of neural signals opens groundbreaking possibilities for promising use-cases. It can help promote self-awareness, emotional regulation, and stress management by providing real-time feedback on the mind-body connection. The ability to visualize and analyze real-time neural signals in a non-invasive form spurs developments in brain-computer interfaces (BCIs) and neurofeedback technologies.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026quot;We are excited to introduce the Mudra Band application, along with the unique Mudra Apple Watch Face, which will revolutionize the way Apple ecosystem users interact with their devices,\u0026quot; said Asher Dahan, Chief Executive Officer of Wearable Devices. \u0026quot;While the Mudra Band device is currently in pre-order, the launch of the app on the Apple App Store and the addition of the specialized watch face bring us one step closer to our vision of touchless spatial interactions using familiar gestures. With these new features, we believe users will experience a new level of convenience and efficiency in their daily interactions with their Apple devices.\u0026quot;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Mudra Band app for Apple Watch is now available for download on the Apple App Store. To learn more about Mudra Band, its capabilities, and to stay updated on the availability of the Mudra Band device, please visit\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=kcBbI2yPG_S3P7DX0x6rmX6Wgph8KjzisrbEh79IBdylsYo9e8I-FT1NWPSV1Ks1lrwp2-NgP3RRFI5hMElLhtnWvBA0R8Xm9VX_7rrqfz8=\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ewww.mudra-band.com\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["AAPL","WLDS"],"source":"benzinga"}]

Its typical price tag of $999 made it a great catch; at the slashed price of just $799, it\u0026#8217;s undoubtedly the steal of the year.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAt just $799, you can choose a 256GB SSD MacBook Air in any of its three colors, coupled with the standard 8GB of unified memory or RAM. [{"T":"n","id":32921907,"headline":"Rivian Accelerates Electrification Through Adoption Of North American Charging Standard And Access To Tesla\u0026#39;s Supercharger Network For Rivian Drivers; Rivian Drivers Will Have Access To More Than 12,000 Tesla Superchargers In 2024","summary":"\n\tRivian drivers will have access to more than 12,000 Tesla Superchargers in 2024\n\tRivian Adventure Network to continue nationwide expansion\n\tRivian will incorporate North American Charging Standard (NACS) charge ports","author":"Happy Mohamed","created_at":"2023-06-20T12:46:03Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T12:46:03Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32921907/rivian-accelerates-electrification-through-adoption-of-north-american-charging-standard-and-access-t","content":"\u003cul\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eRivian drivers will have access to more than 12,000 Tesla Superchargers in 2024\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eRivian Adventure Network to continue nationwide expansion\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\t\u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eRivian will incorporate North American Charging Standard (NACS) charge ports in R1 vehicles starting in 2025 as well as upcoming R2 platform\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eRivian Automotive, Inc. (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/RIVN#NASDAQ\"\u003eRIVN\u003c/a\u003e) today announced it has signed an agreement with Tesla to provide Rivian drivers access to Tesla\u0026#39;s Supercharger network across the United States and Canada. Central to its mission to electrify and decarbonize transportation, Rivian will also continue to expand its own Rivian Adventure Network.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eAn adapter will be available to enable Rivian\u0026#39;s award-winning R1T and R1S to charge on the Supercharger network as early as spring 2024. Rivian will incorporate North American Charging Standard (NACS) charge ports as standard in future R1 vehicles starting in 2025, as well as in its upcoming R2 platform.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eTransportation is responsible for over a quarter of U.S. greenhouse gas emissions, highlighting the urgent need to electrify the sector and preserve our world for future generations. By enabling drivers to charge their vehicles at a greater number of locations, this collaboration and others like it are important to help accelerate EV adoption.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eRebecca Tinucci, Tesla\u0026#39;s Senior Director of Charging Infrastructure said:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u0026quot;It\u0026#39;s great to see the industry coming together to adopt the North American Charging Standard. By doing so, we\u0026#39;re collectively ensuring all EV drivers have access to easy to use, reliable charging hardware. We look forward to welcoming Rivian owners to thousands of our Superchargers across North America.\u0026quot;\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eRJ Scaringe, Founder and CEO of Rivian said:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u0026quot;We\u0026#39;re excited to work with Tesla and to see collaborations like this help advance the world toward carbon neutrality. The adoption of the North American Charging Standard will enable our existing and future customers to leverage Tesla\u0026#39;s expansive Supercharger network while we continue to build out our Rivian Adventure Network. We look forward to continuing to find new ways to accelerate EV adoption.\u0026quot;\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["RIVN","TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":32924098,"headline":"AMD Promises An AI Chip Power Shift","summary":"Last Tuesday, Advanced Micro Devices Inc (NASDAQ: AMD) unveiled a new chip that holds the promise to be the biggest threat to date to the monopoly of the AI chip market leader, Nvidia Corporation (NASDAQ: NVDA).","author":"Upwallstreet","created_at":"2023-06-20T13:43:20Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T13:43:20Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/23/06/32924098/amd-promises-an-ai-chip-power-shift","content":"\u003cp\u003eLast Tuesday, Advanced Micro Devices Inc (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AMD#NASDAQ\"\u003eAMD\u003c/a\u003e) unveiled a new chip that holds the promise to be the biggest threat to date to the monopoly of the AI chip market leader, Nvidia Corporation (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/NVDA#NASDAQ\"\u003eNVDA\u003c/a\u003e). GPUs are undoubtedly powering the AI race, as these chips are used by OpenAI that built ChatGPT which seems to have started all the hype and certainly brought in a lot of good vibes to Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/MSFT#NASDAQ\"\u003eMSFT\u003c/a\u003e).\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eThe\u0026nbsp;MI300X\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eTargeted as a competitor to H100 GPU from Nvidia,\u0026nbsp;AMD\u0026rsquo;s forthcoming most-advanced GPU for artificial intelligence applications is expected to arrive to customers later this year. Its CDNA architecture is designed for large language models that use lots of memory as well as other cutting-edge AI models. AMD did not disclose any pricing details but lower pricing will not only put a price pressure on Nvidia whose\u0026nbsp;H100 comes at\u0026nbsp;$30,000 or more, but also have a deep impact on the development of generative AI applications that are high in cost.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eThe AI Opportunity And Untapped Market\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eWhile the PC market struggles to get out of its post-pandemic slump,\u0026nbsp;CEO Lisa Su\u0026nbsp;finds AI to be AMD\u0026rsquo;s largest and by far the biggest strategic long-term growth opportunity.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAccording to Analysts, AMD is certainly one of the greatest challenges to Nvidia especially with this new release that AMD will sell to everybody, but the key of its success remains lies in how many developers will want to use it. For example, AI developers preferred Nvidia chips due to a well-developed software package CUDA that enabled them to access the chip\u0026rsquo;s core hardware features. But AMD\u0026nbsp;revealed on Tuesday it made its own software for its AI chips, ROCm.\u0026nbsp;If developers embrace AMD\u0026rsquo;s chips, named by the company as accelerators, as a substitute for those made by Nvidia, the AI chip market is certainly in for a power shift and AMD is in for a turnaround as its current brand identity is tied to traditional computer processors. Reuters reported that Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AMZN#NASDAQ\"\u003eAMZN\u003c/a\u003e) is considering AMD\u0026rsquo;s chips but still hasn\u0026rsquo;t decided which chips will power its AI efforts, however Amazon has not made any public commitments.\u0026nbsp;Dave Brown, vice president of elastic compute cloud at Amazon,\u0026nbsp;did state that AMD and AWS teams are working together, while Amazon declined to work with Nvidia on the\u0026nbsp;DGX Cloud offering. But, it is common knowledge that Amazon, more precisely AWS, likes to design its serves from the ground up. For example, when it started selling H100 chips that Nvidia makes, it did it as part of its design.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eIntel Is The Living Proof That Future Is Promised To No One\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eOn Friday, Intel Corporation (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/INTC#NASDAQ\"\u003eINTC\u003c/a\u003e) revealed\u0026nbsp;it will be commiting\u0026nbsp;$4.6 billion in its new chip assembly and test facility in Poland as part of its plan to build capacity across three continents and restore its chip making leadership position. Last year, Intel announced it will be building a massive chip complex in Germany, as well as facilities in Ireland and France. Intel also announced yesterday that after 15 years, it is rebranding its consumer CPU. With a simplified naming scheme that focuses on its Core branding, many have noticed the new looks somewhat similar to AMD\u0026rsquo;s Ryzen naming scheme. After being the unquestioned leader with an almost market monopoly for over a decade, Intel is no longer fighting only against AMD who was its chief rival but also with Nvidia who took absolute charge because it was the first to enter the AI game and it did it early. But as Google and Amazon design their own chips, even Nvidia will be facing increased competition.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eAMD\u0026#39;s AI Journey Could Be A\u0026nbsp;Game-changing One\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAMD president Victor Pen\u0026nbsp;admitted that this is a journey but assured AMD has made great progress in building a powerful product that works with various systems, models, libraries and frameworks. All in all, it seems like AMD\u0026rsquo;s newest chips have the potential to\u0026nbsp;redefine the AI chip landscape.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eDISCLAIMER: This content is for informational purposes only. It is not intended as investing advice.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n ","symbols":["AMD","AMZN","INTC","MSFT","NVDA"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":32923995,"headline":"Rivian Aligns with Tesla\u0026#39;s North America Charging Protocol to Boost Customer Access and EV Growth","summary":"Electric vehicle manufacturer Rivian Automotive Inc (NASDAQ: RIVN) has agreed to embrace Tesla Inc’s (NASDAQ: TSLA) North America charging standard.","author":"Shivani Kumaresan","created_at":"2023-06-20T14:13:38Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T14:13:39Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32923995/rivian-aligns-with-teslas-north-america-charging-protocol-to-boost-customer-access-and-ev-growth","content":"\u003cp\u003eElectric vehicle manufacturer\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eRivian Automotive Inc\u0026nbsp;\u003c/strong\u003e(NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/RIVN#NASDAQ\"\u003eRIVN\u003c/a\u003e) has agreed to embrace\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eTesla Inc\u0026rsquo;s\u0026nbsp;\u003c/strong\u003e(NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSLA#NASDAQ\"\u003eTSLA\u003c/a\u003e) North America charging standard.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe move, Rivian claimed, would give customers access to the biggest U.S. charging network, reported\u0026nbsp;\u003ca class=\"editor-rtfLink\" href=\"https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/ev-maker-rivian-adopt-teslas-charging-standard-2023-06-20/\" style=\"color:#4a6ee0; background:transparent; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eReuters\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe customers will be able to access 12,000 Tesla Superchargers with adapters in the United States and Canada as early as spring 2024.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe company will also make a Tesla-style charging port standard in its vehicles from 2025.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eTesla\u0026rsquo;s Superchargers\u0026nbsp;\u003ca class=\"editor-rtfLink\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32920567/hyundai-mulls-joining-teslas-north-american-charging-standard-alliance-report\" style=\"color:#4a6ee0; background:transparent; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt\" target=\"_blank\"\u003econstitute about 60%\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;of the total fast chargers available in the U.S.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e\u003cem\u003eAlso Read\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cem\u003e:\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003e\u003ca class=\"editor-rtfLink\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/markets/equities/23/06/32918267/us-lawmakers-to-dissuade-automakers-from-china-reliance-report\" style=\"color:#4a6ee0; background:transparent; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt\" target=\"_blank\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eUS Lawmakers To Dissuade Automakers From China Reliance\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eHowever, Rivian, which makes the R1T pickup truck and the R1S SUV, said it would continue to expand its own charging network.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eTesla has struck deals in recent weeks with automotive giants, including\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eFord Motor Co\u0026nbsp;\u003c/strong\u003e(NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/F#NYSE\"\u003eF\u003c/a\u003e) and\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eGeneral Motors Co\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;(NYSE:\u0026nbsp;\u003ca class=\"editor-rtfLink\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/gm#NYSE\" style=\"color:#4a6ee0; background:transparent; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eGM\u003c/a\u003e) to use its charging technology.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eBy opening its charging network to electric vehicles from other brands, Tesla stands to gain some of the $7.5 billion in subsidies the Biden administration has approved to boost charging infrastructure in the U.S.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ePrice Action\u003c/strong\u003e: RIVN shares are trading higher by 4.67% at $15.58 on the last check Tuesday.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003ePhoto via Wikimedia Commons\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n ","symbols":["F","GM","RIVN","TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":32926471,"headline":"NVIDIA Unusual Options Activity","summary":" ","author":"Benzinga Insights","created_at":"2023-06-20T14:33:24Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T14:33:25Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/markets/options/23/06/32926471/nvidia-unusual-options-activity","content":"\u003cp\u003eSomeone with a lot of money to spend has taken a bearish stance on \u003cstrong\u003eNVIDIA\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/NVDA#NASDAQ\"\u003eNVDA\u003c/a\u003e).\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAnd retail traders should know.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWe noticed this today when the big position showed up on publicly available options history that we track here at Benzinga.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWhether this is an institution or just a wealthy individual, we don't know. But when something this big happens with NVDA, it often means somebody knows something is about to happen.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSo how do we know what this whale just did? \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eToday, \u003ca href=\"https://pro.benzinga.com/?utm_source=insights\"\u003eBenzinga\u003c/a\u003e's options scanner spotted 71 uncommon options trades for NVIDIA.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThis isn't normal.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe overall sentiment of these big-money traders is split between 25% bullish and 74%, bearish.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eOut of all of the special options we uncovered, 20 are puts, for a total amount of $1,347,919, and 51 are calls, for a total amount of $3,955,067.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch3\u003eWhat's The Price Target?\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eTaking into account the Volume and Open Interest on these contracts, it appears that whales have been targeting a price range from $300.0 to $500.0 for NVIDIA over the last 3 months. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch3\u003eVolume \u0026amp; [{"T":"n","id":32926909,"headline":"\u0026#39;Bernie Sanders Launches Senate Investigation Into Amazon Labor Practices\u0026#39; - Washington Post","summary":"https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2023/06/20/sanders-investigation-sentate-amazon/\n\nSen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.), chair of the influential Senate committee on health, education, labor and pension, launched an","author":"Happy Mohamed","created_at":"2023-06-20T14:46:49Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T14:46:49Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32926909/bernie-sanders-launches-senate-investigation-into-amazon-labor-practices-washington-post","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2023/06/20/sanders-investigation-sentate-amazon/\" title=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2023/06/20/sanders-investigation-sentate-amazon/\"\u003ehttps://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2023/06/20/sanders-investigation-sentate-amazon/\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eSen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.), chair of the influential Senate committee on health, education, labor and pension, launched an investigation this week into the nation\u0026rsquo;s second-largest employer, Amazon, and the working conditions inside its warehouses.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eIn a letter to Amazon chief executive Andy Jassy, the Vermont senator demanded information about the company\u0026rsquo;s \u0026ldquo;systematically underreported\u0026rdquo; injury rates, turnover, productivity targets and adherence to federal and state safety recommendations. Sanders has often castigated Amazon in fervent speeches on income inequality and corporate greed in America.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;Amazon sets an example for the rest of the country,\u0026rdquo; Sanders told The Washington Post in an interview about his decision to focus on the e-commerce giant. \u0026ldquo;What Amazon does, their attitude, their lack of respect for workers permeates the American corporate world.\u0026rdquo;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eAmazon founder Jeff Bezos owns The Post. Interim Post chief executive Patty Stonesifer sits on Amazon\u0026rsquo;s board.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eSanders\u0026rsquo;s Amazon probe is the latest in a series of investigations that the self-proclaimed socialist and two-time presidential candidate has launched since assuming his role as chairman of the Senate HELP Committee in January. The position has given him vast authority to direct national attention to the practices of some of the country\u0026rsquo;s most powerful companies, such as Starbucks and Moderna, and to interrogate their corporate leaders.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eAn investigation into workplace health and safety practices at Amazon \u0026mdash; the e-commerce giant that has drawn attention for opposing union organizing efforts and for injury rates\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.google.com/search?q=injury+rates+amazon+washington+post\u0026amp;sxsrf=APwXEdfTXEL3LUp_NeMyX2LtOtuBSJwo-g%3A1686952466151\u0026amp;ei=EtqMZKnjCLmpptQPltussAo\u0026amp;ved=0ahUKEwiptP3T48j_AhW5lIkEHZYtC6YQ4dUDCBA\u0026amp;uact=5\u0026amp;oq=injury+rates+amazon+washington+post\u0026amp;gs_lcp=Cgxnd3Mtd2l6LXNlcnAQAzIFCCEQoAEyBQghEKsCMgUIIRCrAjoECAAQRzoGCAAQFhAeOggIABCKBRCGA0oECEEYAFBkWP8MYI0OaABwAngAgAGcAYgBxAqSAQQxNS4xmAEAoAEBwAEByAEI\u0026amp;sclient=gws-wiz-serp\u0026amp;bshm=nce/1\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eroughly double\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;the industry average \u0026mdash; gives Sanders an outlet to push for accountability from one of the country\u0026rsquo;s most influential employers amid a party split Congress.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eSteve Kelly, a spokesperson for Amazon responded that the company had \u0026ldquo;received Chairman Sanders\u0026rsquo; letter this evening and are in the early stages of reviewing it.\u0026rdquo; He noted that Amazon had an open invitation for Sanders to tour one of Amazon\u0026rsquo;s warehouses.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe HELP committee\u0026rsquo;s previous major target was Starbucks. In January, Sanders wrote a similar letter to Starbucks founder and former CEO Howard Schultz, accusing the company of refusing to bargain a contract with workers who voted to unionize. In March, Schulz testified before the congressional committee under threat of subpoena from Sanders. \u0026ldquo;Over the past 18 months, Starbucks has waged the most aggressive and illegal union-busting campaign in the modern history of our country,\u0026rdquo; Sanders said at the hearing.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eA Starbucks spokesperson\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2023/03/24/starbucks-union-shareholder-howard-schultz-bargaining/?itid=lk_inline_manual_16\" target=\"_blank\"\u003esaid at the time\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;that Starbucks had not attempted to delay bargaining and that the company has come to the table as legally obligated at stores that have voted to unionize.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eRegarding whether the senator intends to call Amazon\u0026rsquo;s Jassy or founder Bezos to testify in a similar hearing, Sanders said, \u0026ldquo;that\u0026rsquo;s an absolute possibility.\u0026rdquo;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eIn his letter to Jassy, Sanders describes Amazon\u0026rsquo;s warehouse conditions as \u0026ldquo;uniquely dangerous.\u0026rdquo; He pointed to a recent report compiled by a coalition of labor unions using federal data that found Amazon\u0026rsquo;s serious injury rate was double the warehouse industry average in 2021. He also cited government investigations that found health and safety violations at Amazon facilities, and his own conversations with Amazon warehouse workers.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;Amazon is one of the most valuable companies in the world, worth $1.3 trillion and its founder, Jeff Bezos, is one of the richest men in the world worth nearly $150 billion,\u0026rdquo; Sanders wrote. \u0026ldquo;Amazon should be one of the safest places in America to work, not one of the most dangerous.\u0026rdquo;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eKelly, the company spokesperson, said that Amazon has recorded a 23 percent reduction in injuries since 2019, and pointed to a past statement about Amazon\u0026rsquo;s critics splicing the data \u0026quot;to suit their narrative.\u0026rdquo;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;We\u0026rsquo;ve invested more than $1 billion into safety initiatives, projects and programs in the last four years, and we\u0026rsquo;ll continue investing and inventing in this area because nothing is more important than our employees\u0026rsquo; safety,\u0026rdquo; Kelly said.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eSanders has long slammed working conditions and pay at Amazon. After a campaign led by Sanders, Amazon in 2018 made a\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2018/10/02/amazon-announces-it-will-boost-minimum-wage-all-workers-after-facing-criticism/?itid=lk_inline_manual_27\" target=\"_blank\"\u003esurprising announcement:\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;It would raise its base hourly pay rate to $15, more than twice the national minimum wage.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;We listened to our critics, thought hard about what we wanted to do and decided we want to lead,\u0026rdquo; Bezos, who was CEO of Amazon at the time, said in a statement. \u0026ldquo;We\u0026rsquo;re excited about this change and encourage our competitors and other large employers to join us.\u0026rdquo;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eSanders said he was \u0026ldquo;appreciative\u0026rdquo; of Amazon\u0026rsquo;s decision to raise its starting wage in his interview with The Post. But said he has been \u0026ldquo;extremely upset by their vehement anti-union behavior\u0026rdquo; and workplace safety record.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;The proof is in the pudding,\u0026rdquo; Sanders said, noting the Amazon\u0026rsquo;s high level of attrition. A 2021 New York Times investigation found that the company\u0026rsquo;s turnover rate was roughly 150 percent a year.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eSanders has requested that Jassy and Amazon respond by July 5.\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["AMZN","SPY"],"source":"benzinga"}]

As I stated last week, I like to chart using ES rather than SPY or SPX because ES runs 23 hours a day, 5 days a week, and that will lead to a lot less gaps and give some key overnight levels from overseas trading. Last week was another strong one, creating another bullish imbalance in the process. I will view that area from 4297 to 4348 as support moving forward. Price did make its way into a bearish imbalance, which ranges from 4449 to 4572. While these are large ranges, I believe having higher time frame levels can help set a bias going into a new week. I\u0026#39;d like to see the market pullback into the newly formed bullish imbalance I referred to above, and reprice higher from there.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cimg src=\"https://public-files.gumroad.com/330mze07o4zc1pshfh5f0rv2hdgc\" style=\"height:371px; width:624px\" /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eES Daily - Bullish imbalance formed on the daily Friday, from 4439 to 4451. [{"T":"n","id":32927715,"headline":"What\u0026#39;s Going On With C3.ai (AI) Stock Tuesday?","summary":"C3.ai, Inc. (NYSE: AI) shares are trading lower on Tuesday. Despite Tuesday\u0026#39;s pullback, the stock has trended higher over the last month largely driven by increased enthusiasm around the AI sector.","author":"Erica Kollmann","created_at":"2023-06-20T16:20:32Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T16:20:33Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32927715/whats-going-on-with-c3-ai-ai-stock-tuesday","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eC3.ai, Inc.\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AI#NYSE\"\u003eAI\u003c/a\u003e) shares are trading lower on Tuesday. Despite Tuesday\u0026#39;s pullback, the stock has trended higher over the last month largely driven by increased enthusiasm around the AI sector. On Tuesday morning, the company \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/quote/AI\"\u003eannounced an upcoming investor day. \u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat To Know: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eC3 AI said it will host an investor day on Thursday\u0026nbsp;to provide investors with a company update, including information about its product roadmap, product demonstrations including C3 Generative AI and updates on its partner ecosystem. The event will include presentations by C3 AI CEO, \u003cstrong\u003eThomas\u0026nbsp;Siebel\u003c/strong\u003e, and other members of the executive team and will be broadcast to the investor community via a live webcast.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eC3.ai stock has traded\u0026nbsp;more than 50% higher over the last month, benefitting from a recent rally in AI stocks sparked in part by \u003cstrong\u003eNvidia\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/NVDA#NASDAQ\"\u003eNVDA\u003c/a\u003e) and the rise in NVDA shares\u0026nbsp;after the chipmaker delivered a huge beat for the first\u0026nbsp;quarter\u0026nbsp;and issued a remarkable increase to its second-quarter forecast.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAccording to \u003ca href=\"https://pro.benzinga.com/?gspk=YWRhbWVja2VydDUzMzY\u0026amp;gsxid=zBMR4PKmcgBw\"\u003eBenzinga Pro\u003c/a\u003e, there is significant short interest in C3.ai stock with over 33% of available shares currently being sold short.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRelated News: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32926604/why-vci-global-shares-are-rocketing-higher-tuesday\"\u003eWhy VCI Global Shares Are Rocketing Higher Tuesday\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAI Price Action: \u003c/strong\u003eAccording to \u003ca href=\"https://pro.benzinga.com/?gspk=YWRhbWVja2VydDUzMzY\u0026amp;gsxid=zBMR4PKmcgBw\"\u003eBenzinga Pro\u003c/a\u003e, AI shares are trading 4.74% lower at $42.38\u0026nbsp;at the time of publication.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eImage: Courtesy of C3.ai\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n","symbols":["AI","NVDA"],"source":"benzinga"}]
[{"T":"n","id":32929474,"headline":"Reported Earlier, \u0026#39;Biden To Meet With Experts About The Dangers Of AI On Visit To San Francisco\u0026#39; - LA Times","summary":"https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2023-06-20/president-joe-biden-ai-artificial-intelligence-san-francisco#:~:text=President%20Biden%20is%20scheduled%20to,losses%2C%20discrimination%20and%20privacy%20violations\n\n\u0026amp;n","author":"Happy Mohamed","created_at":"2023-06-20T16:20:57Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T16:20:58Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/economics/macro-economic-events/23/06/32929474/reported-earlier-biden-to-meet-with-experts-about-the-dangers-of-ai-on-visit-to-s","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2023-06-20/president-joe-biden-ai-artificial-intelligence-san-francisco#:~:text=President%20Biden%20is%20scheduled%20to,losses%2C%20discrimination%20and%20privacy%20violations\" title=\"https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2023-06-20/president-joe-biden-ai-artificial-intelligence-san-francisco#:~:text=President%20Biden%20is%20scheduled%20to,losses%2C%20discrimination%20and%20privacy%20violations\"\u003ehttps://www.latimes.com/california/story/2023-06-20/president-joe-biden-ai-artificial-intelligence-san-francisco#:~:text=President%20Biden%20is%20scheduled%20to,losses%2C%20discrimination%20and%20privacy%20violations\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003ePresident Biden is scheduled to meet researchers and advocates with expertise in artificial intelligence on Tuesday in San Francisco as his administration attempts to tackle\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.whitehouse.gov/ostp/news-updates/2023/05/04/fact-sheet-biden-harris-administration-announces-new-actions-to-promote-responsible-ai-innovation-that-protects-americans-rights-and-safety/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003epotential dangers\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;of a technology that could fuel misinformation, job losses, discrimination and privacy violations.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe meeting comes as Biden ramps up efforts to raise money for his 2024 reelection bid, including from tech billionaires. While visiting Silicon Valley on Monday, he attended two fundraisers, including one co-hosted by entrepreneur Reid Hoffman who has numerous ties to AI businesses. The venture capitalist was an early investor in Open AI, which built the popular ChatGPT app, and sits on the board of tech companies including Microsoft that are investing heavily in AI.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eExperts Biden is expected to meet with Tuesday include some of Big Tech\u0026rsquo;s loudest critics. The list includes children\u0026rsquo;s advocate Jim Steyer, who founded and leads Common Sense Media; Tristan Harris, executive director and co-founder of the Center for Humane Technology; Joy Buolamwini, founder of the Algorithmic Justice League; and Fei-Fei Li, Co-Director of Stanford\u0026rsquo;s Human-Centered AI Institute.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eSome of the experts have experience working inside major tech companies. Harris, a former Google product manager and design ethicist, has spoken out about how social media companies like Facebook and Twitter can harm people\u0026rsquo;s mental health and amplify misinformation.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eBiden\u0026rsquo;s meetings with AI researchers and tech executives underscore how the president is engaging both sides as his campaign tries to attract wealthy donors while his administration examines the risks of the fast-growing technology. While Biden has been\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/business/story/2021-07-19/biden-facebook-killing-people-comment-covid-misinformation\"\u003ecritical of tech giants\u003c/a\u003e, executives and workers from companies such as Apple, Microsoft, Google and Meta also contributed\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/01/big-tech-employees-rally-biden/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003emillions of dollars\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;to his campaign in the 2020 election cycle.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;AI is a top priority for the president and his team. Generative AI tools have increased significantly in the past several months and we don\u0026rsquo;t want to solve yesterday\u0026rsquo;s problem,\u0026rdquo; a White House official said in a statement.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Biden administration has been focusing on\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.whitehouse.gov/ostp/news-updates/2023/05/04/fact-sheet-biden-harris-administration-announces-new-actions-to-promote-responsible-ai-innovation-that-protects-americans-rights-and-safety/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eAI\u0026rsquo;s risks\u003c/a\u003e. Last year, the administration released a\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.whitehouse.gov/ostp/ai-bill-of-rights/#discrimination\" target=\"_blank\"\u003e\u0026ldquo;Blueprint for an AI Bill of Rights,\u0026rdquo;\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;outlining five principles developers should keep in mind before they release new AI-powered tools. The administration also met with tech CEOs, announced steps the federal government took to address AI risks and advanced other efforts to \u0026ldquo;promote responsible American innovation.\u0026rdquo;\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eLina Khan, the Federal Trade Commission chairperson who was appointed by Biden, said in a\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2023/05/03/opinion/ai-lina-khan-ftc-technology.html\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eMay op-ed\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;published in the New York Times that the rise of tech platforms like Facebook and Google cost users their privacy and security.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;As the use of A.I. becomes more widespread, public officials have a responsibility to ensure this hard-learned history doesn\u0026rsquo;t repeat itself,\u0026rdquo; Khan said.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eTech giants use AI in various products to recommend videos, power virtual assistants and transcribe audio. While AI has been around for decades, the popularity of an AI chatbot known as ChatGPT intensified a race between big tech players like Microsoft, Google and Facebook\u0026rsquo;s parent company Meta. Launched in 2022 by OpenAI, ChatGPT can answer questions, generate text and complete a variety of tasks.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe rush to advance AI technology has made tech workers, researchers, lawmakers and regulators uneasy about whether new products will be released before they\u0026rsquo;re safe. In March, Tesla, SpaceX and Twitter Chief Executive Elon Musk, Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak and other technology leaders called for\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://futureoflife.org/open-letter/pause-giant-ai-experiments/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eAI labs\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;to pause the training of advanced AI systems and urged developers to work with policy makers. AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton, 75,\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2023/05/01/technology/ai-google-chatbot-engineer-quits-hinton.html\" target=\"_blank\"\u003equit his job at Google\u0026nbsp;\u003c/a\u003eso he could speak about AI\u0026rsquo;s risks more openly.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eAs technology rapidly advances, lawmakers and regulators have struggled to keep up. In California, Gov. Gavin Newsom signaled he wants to tread carefully with state-level AI regulation. Newsom said at a Los Angeles\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://milkeninstitute.org/panel/14795/conversation-california-governor-gavin-newsom\" target=\"_blank\"\u003econference\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;in May that \u0026ldquo;the biggest mistake\u0026rdquo; politicians can make is asserting themselves \u0026ldquo;without first seeking to understand.\u0026rdquo; California lawmakers have floated several ideas, including legislation that would combat\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://a16.asmdc.org/press-releases/20230411-assemblymember-bauer-kahans-ab-331-regulating-automated-decision-tools\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ealgorithmic discrimination\u003c/a\u003e, establish an office of artificial intelligence and create a working group that would provide the Legislature with an AI report.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eWriters and artists are also worried that companies could use AI to replace workers. The use of AI to generate text and art comes with ethical questions, including about plagiarism and copyright infringement. The Writer\u0026rsquo;s Guild of America, which remains on strike,\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/entertainment-arts/business/story/2023-03-22/writers-guild-lays-sets-out-rules-against-the-use-of-ai-in-hollywood-during-new-contract-talks\"\u003eproposed rules\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;in March on how Hollywood studios can use AI. Text generated from AI chatbots, for example, \u0026ldquo;cannot be considered in determining writing credits,\u0026rdquo; under the proposed rules.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe potential abuse of AI to spread political propaganda and conspiracy theories, a problem that has plagued social media, is another top concern among\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://arxiv.org/pdf/2301.04246.pdf\" target=\"_blank\"\u003edisinformation researchers\u003c/a\u003e. They fear\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2023-05-14/ai-presents-political-peril-for-2024-with-threat-to-mislead-voters\"\u003eAI tools\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;that can spit out text and images will make it easier and cheaper for bad actors to spread misleading information.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eAlready, AI has begun to be deployed in some mainstream political ads. The Republican National Committee posted an AI-generated video ad that depicts a dystopian future if Biden wins his reelection bid in 2024. AI tools have also been used to create\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/technology-science-fires-artificial-intelligence-misinformation-26cabd20dcacbd68c8f38610fec39f5b\" target=\"_blank\"\u003efake audio clips\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;of politicians and celebrities making remarks they didn\u0026rsquo;t actually say. The campaign of GOP presidential candidate and Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis shared a\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/2023/06/08/1181097435/desantis-campaign-shares-apparent-ai-generated-fake-images-of-trump-and-fauci\" target=\"_blank\"\u003evideo\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;of what appeared to be AI-generated images of former President Trump hugging Dr. Anthony Fauci.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eTech companies aren\u0026rsquo;t opposed to guardrails. They\u0026rsquo;re welcoming regulation but are also trying to shape it. In May, Microsoft released a\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://query.prod.cms.rt.microsoft.com/cms/api/am/binary/RW14Gtw\" target=\"_blank\"\u003e42-page report\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;about governing AI, noting that no company is above the law. The report includes a \u0026ldquo;blueprint for the public governance of AI\u0026rdquo; that outlines five points, including the creation of \u0026ldquo;safety breaks\u0026rdquo; for AI systems that control the electric grid, water systems and other critical infrastructure.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThat same month, OpenAI CEO\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.latimes.com/business/story/2023-05-16/openai-ibm-urge-senate-to-act-on-ai-regulation\"\u003eSam Altman testified\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;before Congress and called for AI regulation.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;My worst fear is that we, the technology industry, cause significant harm to the world,\u0026rdquo; Altman told lawmakers. \u0026ldquo;If this technology goes wrong, it can go quite wrong.\u0026rdquo; Altman, who has met with leaders in Europe, Asia, Africa and the Middle East, also signed a\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.safe.ai/statement-on-ai-risk\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eone-sentence letter\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;in May with scientists and other leaders that warned about the \u0026ldquo;risk of extinction\u0026rdquo; AI poses.\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["MSFT","SPY"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":32929687,"headline":"Worksport And Stellantis Are Raising Their Games While Tesla Gets Closer To Changing The Industry Charging Standard","summary":"What started as a slow week with markets being closed on Monday for a federal holiday, is now an exciting one on the EV and automotive front. Tonneau cover manufacturer Worksport Ltd (NASDAQ: WKSP) just announced it will be applying for a prestigious certification while Stellantis N.V.","author":"Upwallstreet","created_at":"2023-06-20T16:35:49Z","updated_at":"2023-06-20T16:35:50Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/markets/penny-stocks/23/06/32929687/worksport-and-stellantis-are-raising-their-games-while-tesla-gets-closer-to-changing-the-ind","content":"\u003cp\u003eWhat started as a slow week with markets being closed on Monday for a federal holiday, is now an exciting one on the EV and automotive front. Tonneau cover manufacturer\u0026nbsp;Worksport Ltd (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/WKSP#NASDAQ\"\u003eWKSP\u003c/a\u003e) just announced it will be applying for a prestigious certification while Stellantis N.V. (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/STLA#NYSE\"\u003eSTLA\u003c/a\u003e) unveiled its new tool with which it will challenge the EV king Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSLA#NASDAQ\"\u003eTSLA\u003c/a\u003e) as well as its contender to replace the low-cost EV void General Motors (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GM#NYSE\"\u003eGM\u003c/a\u003e) left recently. Also today, Reuters reported that Hyundai Motor (OTC:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/HYMTF#OTC\"\u003eHYMTF\u003c/a\u003e) CEO stated that the South Korean automaker is considering joining Tesla in changing the American charging standard.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eWorksport Applies For\u0026nbsp;ISO 9000 Certification\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eWorksport revealed today it will be applying for its wholly owned 220,000 square feet Western N.Y. manufacturing facility to get an internationally recognized standard for quality management systems. Worksport is a company committed to a zero-defects mentality but adhering to these requirements is certainly a bold move, an achievement in itself that the CEO Steven Rossi believes strongly Worksport can achieve. Rossi\u0026nbsp;admits that gaining the ISO 9000 certification is everything but easy considering that inspectors will be examining every little detail across the company\u0026#39;s\u0026nbsp;key procedures protocol but since its inception, Worksport has been commited to the highest level of quality throughout its actions. At its U.S. facility in question, Worksport expects to soon being able to deliver\u0026nbsp;its innovative\u0026nbsp;light truck tonneau covers and later manufacture its groundbreaking and industry\u0026#39;s first\u0026nbsp;SOLIS\u0026nbsp;solar\u0026nbsp;tonneau covers. With its\u0026nbsp;newly improved hot swap\u0026nbsp;remote battery system COR,\u0026nbsp;Worksport\u0026nbsp;promises to disrupt the EV field with its innovations.\u0026nbsp;Hyundai is one of the first automakers who will\u0026nbsp;benefit from this revolutionary technology as its Santa Cruz electric pickup will be equipped with Worksport\u0026rsquo;s customized solar-powered tonneau cover \u0026nbsp;and portable battery system.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eStellantis Will Be Filling The Void General Motors Left By Withdrawing Bolt\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAs General Motors withdrew its low-priced EV, Stellantis jumped in with its EV contender, a new C\u0026nbsp;Citro\u0026euml;n e-C3. Stellantis\u0026rsquo; low-priced EV should be on the road early next year with a range of 186 miles. By the looks of it, Stellantis could soon have the lowest priced EVs on the market, although Volkswagen (OTC:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/VWAGY#OTC\"\u003eVWAGY\u003c/a\u003e) will be rolling out its ID 1 and ID 2 both under $30,000 but the German automaker did not reveal any dates. Citroen CEO Thierry Koskas stated that the brand has a history of making affordable cars and therefore, its newest role is to bring that to the EV table as affordability is what EVs need to take over the automotive landscape.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eStellantis Is Going For The Affordable\u0026nbsp;EV Crown\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAlso today, Stellantis revealed in a separate announcement that it joined forces with the iPhone assembler Foxconn. The two already joined hands in the Mobile Drive venture under which they are developing in-car and connected technologies for the automotive industry. The purpose of their newest joint creation, SilliconAuto, is to\u0026nbsp;to design and sell semiconductors used in the automotive industry as of 2026. Like Stellantis, SilliconAuto will be based in the Netherlands.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eTesla Delivery And Production Figures Fell Short But Its Superchargers Are Doing The Talking\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eOn June 19th, Tesla revealed it made 1.37 billion EVs which is significantly below its internal target that aimed for 50% growth with worldwide quarter deliveries also coming in short of forecasts. However, its superchargers that make 60% of fast chargers in the U.S. are doing the talking with shares rising more than 40% since the news of Ford Motor (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/F#NYSE\"\u003eF\u003c/a\u003e) entering its charging network came out, a move that was soon followed by General Motors. While challenging the industry charging standard by opening its network of Superchargers, Tesla is also trying to quality for the portion of the\u0026nbsp;the $7.5 billion in subsidies that the Biden administration is giving in order to accelerate the deployment of chargers in the U.S.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eDISCLAIMER: This content is for informational purposes only. It is not intended as investing advice.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n ","symbols":["F","GM","HYMTF","STLA","TSLA","VWAGY","WKSP"],"source":"benzinga"}]

Rossi\u0026nbsp;admits that gaining the ISO 9000 certification is everything but easy considering that inspectors will be examining every little detail across the company\u0026#39;s\u0026nbsp;key procedures protocol but since its inception, Worksport has been commited to the highest level of quality throughout its actions. Stellantis\u0026rsquo; low-priced EV should be on the road early next year with a range of 186 miles. But when something this big happens with TSLA, it often means somebody knows something is about to happen.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSo how do we know what this whale just did? \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eToday, \u003ca href=\"https://pro.benzinga.com/?utm_source=insights\"\u003eBenzinga\u003c/a\u003e's options scanner spotted 545 uncommon options trades for Tesla.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThis isn't normal.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe overall sentiment of these big-money traders is split between 44% bullish and 55%, bearish.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eOut of all of the special options we uncovered, 105 are puts, for a total amount of $7,911,105, and 440 are calls, for a total amount of $29,666,470.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch3\u003eWhat's The Price Target?\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eTaking into account the Volume and Open Interest on these contracts, it appears that whales have been targeting a price range from $5.0 to $825.0 for Tesla over the last 3 months. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch3\u003eVolume \u0026amp;
