[{"T":"n","id":33167659,"headline":"Google\u0026#39;s Medical AI Chatbot Is Being Tested In Hospitals to Answer Questions, Summarize Documents And More","summary":"Google has started deploying its medical AI chatbot that can respond to questions, summarize documents, and more.","author":"Rounak Jain","created_at":"2023-07-10T14:16:07Z","updated_at":"2023-07-10T14:16:08Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33167659/googles-medical-ai-chatbot-is-being-tested-in-hospitals-to-answer-questions-summarize-documents-and","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAlphabet Inc.'s (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GOOGL#NASDAQ\"\u003eGOOGL\u003c/a\u003e) Google\u003c/strong\u003e has started deploying its medical AI chatbot that can respond to questions, summarize documents, and more. The chatbot, \u003cstrong\u003eMed-PaLM 2\u003c/strong\u003e, is currently being tested by \u003cstrong\u003eMayo Clinic\u003c/strong\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat Happened:\u003c/strong\u003e Mayo Clinic, one of the largest hospital chains in the US, is currently testing Google's medical AI chatbot Med-PaLM 2, \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/in-battle-with-microsoft-google-bets-on-medical-ai-program-to-crack-healthcare-industry-bb7c2db8\"\u003ereported\u003c/a\u003e The Wall Street Journal. The chatbot is a variant of the PaLM 2 language model that is specifically tailored for medical institutions.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eSee Also: \u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33167042/new-iphone-14-ad-shows-its-life-saving-crash-detection-in-action\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eNew iPhone 14 Ad Shows Its Life Saving Crash Detection In Action\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe PaLM 2 language model was announced at the \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/large-cap/23/05/32324579/google-io-2023-highlights-ai-progress-palm-2-challenges-chatgpt-and-introduces-cutting-edge-ai-pow\"\u003eGoogle I/O 2023 developer conference\u003c/a\u003e held in May this year. It is the same language model that also powers Google Bard, the AI chatbot that is currently available as an experiment to Google users.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eGoogle has trained Med-PaLM 2 on questions and answers from medical licensing exams – given how sensitive the field is, the chatbot needs to be accurate both in terms of detection as well as responses. Google reportedly believes that this could prove to be useful in countries where access to doctors is \"limited\".\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAt its developer conference, Google demonstrated Med-PaLM 2's reasoning skills and the ability to generate answers. These answers were preferred by users over those generated by physicians.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eGoogle Is Not Alone:\u003c/strong\u003e Google is not the only tech major working on an AI chatbot for the healthcare industry. Rival Microsoft Corp. (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/MSFT#NASDAQ\"\u003eMSFT\u003c/a\u003e) is also working on its own solution based on OpenAI's ChatGPT.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\"\u003e\n\u003ciframe loading=\"lazy\" title=\"Groundbreaking research in health AI \u0026#x7C; The Check Up ‘23 \u0026#x7C; Google Health\" width=\"500\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/3Ud-BMOCkDI?feature=oembed\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" allowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eCheck out more of Benzinga's Consumer Tech coverage by\u003c/em\u003e \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/topic/consumer-tech\"\u003e\u003cem\u003efollowing this link\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003cem\u003e.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next: \u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33165034/the-iphone-15-pro-max-may-burn-a-bigger-hole-in-your-pocket-because-of-this-new-camera-feature\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eThe iPhone 15 Pro Max May Burn A Bigger Hole In Your Pocket Because Of This New Camera Feature\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["GOOGL","MSFT"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":33167977,"headline":"Looking At Apple\u0026#39;s Recent Unusual Options Activity","summary":" ","author":"Benzinga Insights","created_at":"2023-07-10T14:32:56Z","updated_at":"2023-07-10T14:32:57Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/markets/options/23/07/33167977/looking-at-apples-recent-unusual-options-activity","content":"\u003cp\u003eSomeone with a lot of money to spend has taken a bearish stance on \u003cstrong\u003eApple\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AAPL#NASDAQ\"\u003eAAPL\u003c/a\u003e).\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAnd retail traders should know.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWe noticed this today when the big position showed up on publicly available options history that we track here at Benzinga.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWhether this is an institution or just a wealthy individual, we don't know. But when something this big happens with AAPL, it often means somebody knows something is about to happen.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSo how do we know what this whale just did? \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eToday, \u003ca href=\"https://pro.benzinga.com/?utm_source=insights\"\u003eBenzinga\u003c/a\u003e's options scanner spotted 16 uncommon options trades for Apple.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThis isn't normal.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe overall sentiment of these big-money traders is split between 43% bullish and 56%, bearish.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eOut of all of the special options we uncovered, 8 are puts, for a total amount of $338,867, and 8 are calls, for a total amount of $434,862.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch3\u003eWhat's The Price Target?\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eTaking into account the Volume and Open Interest on these contracts, it appears that whales have been targeting a price range from $185.0 to $225.0 for Apple over the last 3 months. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ch3\u003eVolume \u0026amp; Open Interest Development\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eLooking at the volume and open interest is a powerful move while trading options. Jefferies analyst Philippe Houchois maintained a Hold rating and bumped up the price target from $185 to $265. \u003cem\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/23/07/33163828/tesla-analyst-lifts-price-target-ahead-of-q2-but-warns-factors-that-dragged-stock-b\"\u003eRead more here...\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe recent downturn in Tesla has the stock trading in a \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/money/stock-chart-patterns\"\u003ebull flag pattern\u003c/a\u003e, although continued momentum lower will cause the formation to negate.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe bull flag pattern is created with a sharp rise higher forming the pole, which is then followed by a consolidation pattern that brings the stock lower between a channel with parallel lines or into a tightening triangle pattern.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eFor bearish traders, the \u0026quot;trend is your friend\u0026quot; (until it\u0026#39;s not) and the stock may continue downwards within the following channel for a short period of time. Aggressive traders may decide to short the stock at the upper trendline and exit the trade at the lower trendline.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eWant direct analysis? Find me in the BZ Pro lounge! \u003ca href=\"https://benzinga.grsm.io/1ih7p9hphj9p\"\u003eClick here for a free trial\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThe Tesla Chart:\u003c/strong\u003e Tesla\u0026rsquo;s possible bull flag was formed between June 27 and Friday, with the pole printed between that date and July 3 and the flag forming since. On Monday, Tesla was dropping under the eight-day exponential moving average and if the stock closes under that area, the flag will be negated and the downtrend that developed within the flag may continue to draw Tesla lower.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cul\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eThe downtrend within the flag was confirmed on Friday, when Tesla printed a lower high at $280.78. On Monday, Tesla was forming a lower low under the most recent low of $272.88, which was formed on Thursday.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eTesla is also trading in a lower gap, which was created on July 3, when the stock gapped higher to start the trading day. Although the bull flag may be negated, closing the gap is a good sign for bullish traders and the bottom range of the gap may act as support for a bounce.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eTesla has resistance above at $271.71 and $285.83 and support below at $254.98 and $234.35.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cimg alt=\"screenshot_2563.png\" src=\"https://www.benzinga.com/files/u278075/screenshot_2563.png\" style=\"height:427px; width:760px\" /\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next:\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/markets/equities/23/07/33162608/general-motors-slashes-lyriq-ev-price-in-china-by-14-report\"\u003eGeneral Motors Slashes Lyriq EV Price In China By 14%: Report\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eImage: Shutterstock\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n","symbols":["TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":33168844,"headline":"\u0026#39;Meta\u0026#39;s Twitter Rival Threads Overtakes ChatGPT As Fastest-Growing Platform\u0026#39; - Reuters","summary":"https://www.reuters.com/technology/metas-twitter-rival-threads-hits-100-mln-users-record-five-days-2023-07-10/#:~:text=July%2010%20(Reuters)%20%2D%20Meta,platform%20to%20hit%20the%20milestone.\n\nMeta","author":"Happy Mohamed","created_at":"2023-07-10T15:20:58Z","updated_at":"2023-07-10T15:20:59Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33168844/metas-twitter-rival-threads-overtakes-chatgpt-as-fastest-growing-platform-reuters","content":"\u003cp\u003ehttps://www.reuters.com/technology/metas-twitter-rival-threads-hits-100-mln-users-record-five-days-2023-07-10/#:~:text=July%2010%20(Reuters)%20%2D%20Meta,platform%20to%20hit%20the%20milestone.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eMeta Platforms\u0026#39;\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/markets/companies/META.O\" target=\"_blank\"\u003e(META.O)\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;Twitter rival Threads crossed 100 million sign-ups within five days of launch, CEO Mark Zuckerberg said on Monday, dethroning ChatGPT as the fastest-growing online platform to hit the milestone.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThreads has been setting records for user growth since its launch on Wednesday, with celebrities, politicians and other newsmakers joining the platform seen by analysts as the first serious threat to the Elon Musk-owned microblogging app.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026quot;That\u0026#39;s mostly organic demand, and we haven\u0026#39;t even turned on many promotions yet,\u0026quot; Zuckerberg said in a Threads post announcing the milestone.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe app\u0026#39;s sprint to 100 million users was much speedier than that of OpenAI-owned ChatGPT, which became the\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/technology/chatgpt-sets-record-fastest-growing-user-base-analyst-note-2023-02-01/\"\u003efastest-growing consumer application\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;in history in January about two months after its launch, according to a UBS study.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eStill, Threads has some catching up to do. Twitter had nearly 240 million monetizable daily active users as of July last year, according to the company\u0026#39;s last public disclosure before Musk\u0026#39;s takeover.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eTwitter has responded to Threads\u0026#39; arrival by\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/technology/twitter-is-threatening-sue-meta-over-threads-semafor-2023-07-06/\"\u003ethreatening to sue\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;Meta, alleging that the social media behemoth used its trade secrets and other confidential information to build the app.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThat claim,\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/technology/twitter-may-face-difficulties-showing-meta-stole-trade-secrets-2023-07-07/\"\u003elegal experts say\u003c/a\u003e, could be hard to prove.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThreads bears a strong resemblance to Twitter, as do numerous other social media sites that have cropped up in recent months as users have chafed at Musk\u0026#39;s management of the service. It allows posts that are up to 500 characters long and supports links, photos and videos of up to 5 minutes.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe app also does not yet have a direct messaging function and lacks a desktop version that certain users, such as business organizations, rely on.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eIt also currently lacks hashtags and keyword search functions, which limits both its appeal to advertisers and its utility as a place for following real-time events like users frequently do on Twitter.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eStill, analysts said the turmoil at Twitter, including recently imposed limits on the number on tweets users can see, could help Threads to attract users and advertisers.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eCurrently, there are no ads on the Threads app and Zuckerberg said the company would only think about monetization once there was a clear path to 1 billion users.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eInstagram head Adam Mosseri said last week Meta was not trying to replace Twitter and that Threads aimed to focus on light subjects like sports, music, fashion and design.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eHe acknowledged that politics and hard news are inevitably going to show up on Threads, in what would be a challenge for the app\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/technology/metas-friendly-threads-collides-with-unfriendly-internet-2023-07-07/\"\u003epitching itself\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;as the \u0026quot;friendly\u0026quot; option for public discourse online.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\u003cp\u003eReporting by Katie Paul in New York and Akash Sriram and Zaheer Kachwala in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila, Rashmi Aich and Nick Zieminski\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["META","MSFT"],"source":"benzinga"}]

exports from China also fall.\u0026nbsp;This is helping\u0026nbsp;reduce\u0026nbsp;goods inflation in the\u0026nbsp;U.S. and making overall inflation numbers look good.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eAs we have written before, in The Arora Report analysis, it is the core services inflation ex-housing that is important for investors.\u0026nbsp;This includes Smart money is inactive in the early trade.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eFor longer-term, please see oil ratings.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eBitcoin\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eBitcoin (CRYPTO: \u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/quote/btc/usd\"\u003eBTC\u003c/a\u003e) is range bound.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eMarkets\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eOur very, very short-term early stock market indicator is negative.\u0026nbsp;This indicator, with a great track record, is popular among long term investors to stay in tune with the market and among short term traders to independently undertake quick trades.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eProtection Band And What To Do Now\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIt is important for investors to look ahead and not in the rearview mirror.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eConsider continuing to hold good, very long term, existing positions. Based on individual risk preference, consider holding 21% - 39% in cash or Treasury bills or allocated to short-term tactical trades; and short to medium-term hedges of 3% - 6%, and short term hedges of 5% - 8%. This is a good way to protect yourself and participate in the upside at the same time.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eYou can determine your protection bands by adding cash to hedges.\u0026nbsp; The high band of the protection is appropriate for those who are older or conservative. The low band of the protection is appropriate for those who are younger or aggressive.\u0026nbsp; If you do not hedge, the total cash level should be more than stated above but significantly less than cash plus hedges.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eIt is worth reminding that you cannot take advantage of new upcoming opportunities if you are not holding enough cash.\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u003c/strong\u003eWhen adjusting hedge levels, consider adjusting partial stop quantities for stock positions (non ETF); consider using wider stops on remaining quantities and also allowing more room for high beta stocks.\u0026nbsp; High beta stocks are the ones that move more than the market.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch4\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTraditional 60/40 Portfolio\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eProbability based risk reward adjusted for inflation does not favor long duration strategic bond allocation at this time.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThose who want to stick to traditional 60% allocation to stocks and 40% to bonds may consider focusing on only high quality bonds and bonds of five year duration or less.\u0026nbsp; Those willing to bring sophistication to their investing may consider using bond ETFs as tactical positions and not strategic positions at this time.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThe Arora Report is known for its accurate calls.\u0026nbsp; The Arora Report correctly called the 2008 financial crash, the start of a mega bull market in 2009, the COVID crash, the post-COVID bull market, and the 2022 bear market.\u0026nbsp; Please click here to sign up for a free forever \u003ca href=\"https://thearorareport.com/generate-wealth-newsletter\"\u003eGenerate Wealth Newsletter\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n    ","symbols":["AAPL","AMD","AMZN","ASHR","BTCUSD","GOOG","META","MSFT","NVDA","SSNLF","TSLA","TSM"],"source":"benzinga"}]

Ltd.\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSM#NYSE\"\u003eTSM\u003c/a\u003e) is the world\u0026rsquo;s largest contract semiconductor manufacturer.\u0026nbsp;TSM\u0026nbsp;manufactures chips for the likes of Apple, Nvidia, and \u003cstrong\u003eAdvanced Micro Devices, Inc.\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AMD#NASDAQ\"\u003eAMD\u003c/a\u003e).\u0026nbsp;TSM\u0026nbsp;reported June 2023 revenues declined 11.1% year-over-year.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eNegative data from\u0026nbsp;TSM\u0026nbsp;comes on the heels of negative semiconductor production data from \u003cstrong\u003eSamsung Electronics Co Ltd\u003c/strong\u003e (OTC:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/SSNLF#OTC\"\u003eSSNLF\u003c/a\u003e).\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003ePrudent investors need to make note of the semiconductor production data from\u0026nbsp;TSM\u0026nbsp;and Samsung since semiconductors have been the leading sector in this year\u0026rsquo;s stock market rally.\u0026nbsp; Investors have been running up semiconductor stocks on the\u0026nbsp;AI\u0026nbsp;frenzy and also on the assumption that the order downdraft has bottomed.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eAs an actionable item, the sum total of the foregoing is in the protection band, which strikes the optimum balance between various crosscurrents.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eMomo Crowd And Smart Money In Stocks\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe momo crowd is buying stocks in the early trade.\u0026nbsp; Based on individual risk preference, consider holding 21% - 39% in cash or Treasury bills or allocated to short-term tactical trades; and short to medium-term hedges of 3% - 6%, and short term hedges of 5% - 8%. This is a good way to protect yourself and participate in the upside at the same time.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eYou can determine your protection bands by adding cash to hedges.\u0026nbsp; The high band of the protection is appropriate for those who are older or conservative. The low band of the protection is appropriate for those who are younger or aggressive.\u0026nbsp; If you do not hedge, the total cash level should be more than stated above but significantly less than cash plus hedges.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eIt is worth reminding that you cannot take advantage of new upcoming opportunities if you are not holding enough cash.\u0026nbsp;\u0026nbsp;\u003c/strong\u003eWhen adjusting hedge levels, consider adjusting partial stop quantities for stock positions (non ETF); consider using wider stops on remaining quantities and also allowing more room for high beta stocks.\u0026nbsp; High beta stocks are the ones that move more than the market.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch4\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eTraditional 60/40 Portfolio\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eProbability based risk reward adjusted for inflation does not favor long duration strategic bond allocation at this time.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThose who want to stick to traditional 60% allocation to stocks and 40% to bonds may consider focusing on only high quality bonds and bonds of five year duration or less.\u0026nbsp; Those willing to bring sophistication to their investing may consider using bond ETFs as tactical positions and not strategic positions at this time.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThe Arora Report is known for its accurate calls.\u0026nbsp; The Arora Report correctly called the 2008 financial crash, the start of a mega bull market in 2009, the COVID crash, the post-COVID bull market, and the 2022 bear market.\u0026nbsp; Please click here to sign up for a free forever \u003ca href=\"https://thearorareport.com/generate-wealth-newsletter\"\u003eGenerate Wealth Newsletter\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n ","symbols":["AAPL","AMD","AMZN","ASHR","BTCUSD","GOOG","META","MSFT","NVDA","SSNLF","TSLA","TSM"],"source":"benzinga"}]

The broad array of discounted items, as Jassy In said \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/large-cap/23/07/33141588/amazon-ceo-andy-jassy-on-chinese-competition-prime-day-and-more\"\u003eon CNBC\u003c/a\u003e, will be made available not just on Amazon.com but also through third-party merchants participating in the new \"Buy with Prime\" feature.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe move is set to allow direct-to-consumer shipping off of merchants\u0026#8217; own websites.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eNoteworthy deals during Prime Day include 60% off \u003cstrong\u003eGap Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GPS#NYSE\"\u003eGPS\u003c/a\u003e) clothing, 50% off \u003cstrong\u003eSony Group Corp\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/SONY#NYSE\"\u003eSONY\u003c/a\u003e) headphones, Bissell vacuums, and 40% off on \u003cstrong\u003ePeloton Interactive Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/PTON#NASDAQ\"\u003ePTON\u003c/a\u003e) Bike and Bike+.\u003cbr\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Also: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33118426/you-can-grab-the-airpods-pro-2nd-gen-with-50-discount-ahead-of-prime-day-sale\"\u003eYou Can Grab The AirPods Pro 2nd Gen With $50 Discount Ahead Of Prime Day Sale\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eFirst-party Amazon and Alexa items, including the 43\" Fire TV Omni Series, Fire TV Stick (3rd Gen), Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen), Ring Indoor Cam (2nd Gen), Kindle Scribe, and the new Fire Max 11 tablet, are also featured with discounts up to 75%.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003ePost estimates that Prime Day could generate around $12 billion in Gross Merchandise Volume (GMV). With a projected 10% year-over-year first-party Prime Day sales growth and a 14% third-party sales growth, BofA anticipates a total GMV of $11.95 billion for Prime Day.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe shopping event is expected to account for a considerable 7.4% of GMV for the quarter, showing a slight increase from 7.2% last year. Though, it\u0026#8217;s worth noting that Prime Day usually impacts daily sales slightly negatively in the days surrounding the event.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eBut what really sets Prime Day apart this year is Amazon\u0026#8217;s transition to a regionalized logistics network. The upgrade, as pointed out by Jassy, enables the fastest Prime deliveries ever. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eCoupled with more merchant participation and steep discounts, Amazon is expected to have a relatively strong Prime Day, possibly even exceeding BofA\u0026#8217;s 12% growth estimate compared to Prime Day last year.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAhead of the event, Amazon has already started posting deals on its site, including a discount on the Amazon 43-inch Omni 4K Fire TV, available for $99.99 after requesting an invite to buy. More to that, dozens of deals on Alexa-powered devices starting from $12 have already gone live.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAmazon is set to deliver an array of deals across all categories, including consumer electronics, home items, kitchen appliances, apparel, and toys, ensuring a retail event that caters to all shopping preferences and budgets.\u003cbr\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33144544/how-amazons-ceo-plans-to-dominate-the-ai-race-against-microsoft-and-google\"\u003eHow Amazon\u0026#8217;s CEO Plans To Dominate The AI Race Against Microsoft And Google?\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["AMZN","BAC","GPS","PTON","SONY"],"source":"benzinga"}]

However, within a week of its release, the price of the RTX 4060 has dropped to below \u0026euro;315, and even as low as \u0026euro;309, marking a noticeable 6% decline.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIn contrast, the U.S. has not experienced a similar price reduction, as the RTX 4060 continues to be priced at $299 despite mixed reviews, Forbes\u0026nbsp;\u003ca class=\"editor-rtfLink\" href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/antonyleather/2023/07/09/nvidia-in-surprise-graphics-card-price-drops/\" style=\"color:#4a6ee0; background:transparent; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ereports\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eDue to the relatively high pricing and underwhelming reception of the RTX 4060, many PC enthusiasts in both Europe and the U.S. are turning to older graphics cards from\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eAdvanced Micro Devices, Inc\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;(NASDAQ:\u0026nbsp;\u003ca class=\"editor-rtfLink\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/amd#NASDAQ\" style=\"color:#4a6ee0; background:transparent; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eAMD\u003c/a\u003e) and Nvidia, primarily if they do not heavily rely on ray tracing or DLSS features and mainly play older or incompatible games.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eWhile it is common for graphics card prices to decline gradually after their initial launch, the GeForce RTX 4080 has proven to be an exception. Since its release, it has not come close to dropping below $1,000 and has mainly remained around $1,200.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eOverall, graphics card pricing has witnessed significant reductions in recent months, primarily driven by new releases from both AMD and Nvidia. However, the mid-range segment, particularly the RTX 4060\u0026#39;s market, has been relatively underserved, with AMD only releasing lower-end Radeon RX 7600 and higher-end Radeon RX 7900 series cards. The launch of AMD\u0026#39;s anticipated 7700 and 7800 series products is likely in the autumn.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eGaming enthusiasts seeking information on the best graphics card\u0026nbsp;\u003ca class=\"editor-rtfLink\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/money/best-options-to-buy-this-week/\" style=\"color:#4a6ee0; background:transparent; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eoptions\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;2023 can consult reviews and benchmarks of the RTX 4060, Radeon RX 7600, and RTX 4060 Ti. Additionally, Nvidia\u0026#39;s forthcoming RTX 4060 16GB variant is likely for release later in July, adding another option to consider.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAnalyst Rating:\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003cstrong\u003eGoldman Sachs\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;analyst Toshiya Hari maintains Nvidia with a Buy and raises the\u0026nbsp;\u003ca class=\"editor-rtfLink\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/quote/NVDA/analyst-ratings\" style=\"color:#4a6ee0; background:transparent; margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eprice target from $440 to $495\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe stock has gained over 194% YTD, buoyed by the ChatGPT frenzy, making way to the trillion-dollar club valuation ahead of its peers.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ePrice Actions:\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026nbsp;NVDA shares traded lower by 1.05% at $420.48 on the last check Monday. Closing at $193.97, Apple solidified its status as one of the most valuable corporations worldwide.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe stock price needed to pass $190.73 to hit the $3 trillion valuation, which it did with ease.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThis accomplishment indicates a prosperous financial year ahead for the tech behemoth.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eApple\u0026#39;s market cap has recently dipped below the highly sought-after $3 trillion mark.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThis raises an important question. Can Apple regain its momentum and surpass the $3 trillion milestone once again, while maintaining its position?\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eInterestingly, this is not the first time they have accomplished this milestone, as it marks their second occasion.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eApple\u0026#39;s remarkable performance this year suggests a strong likelihood of not only reaching $3 trillion again but also holding onto it.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe company has experienced a significant surge in stock price, with a growth of over 45% throughout the year. If this upward trajectory continues, Apple will undoubtedly enter uncharted territories of market valu, creating record highs in the process.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAfter surpassing the previous all-time high of $182.94 set in January 2022, the price has consistently stayed above this level for four weeks.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThis indicates a strong possibility of the trend continuing, instilling confidence in investors, indicating that Apple\u0026#39;s stock value has established a new normal above its previous peak.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe stock price\u0026#39;s behavior in relation to the daily 20 simple moving average (20 SMA) is equally important.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eCurrently, the stock price is undergoing a pullback towards the 20 SMA at $186.93, which it has consistently remained above.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIt is ideal for investors to witness the 20 SMA acting as support, as it can help drive the stock price further upwards.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cimg alt=\"aapl_10_july.jpg\" src=\"https://www.benzinga.com/files/u517520/aapl_10_july.jpg\" style=\"height:346px; width:624px\" /\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eApple\u0026#39;s path to reaching its next major milestone is hindered by a formidable obstacle, the $200 round number. This figure holds immense psychological significance.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eHowever, if the price manages to surpass this resistance, it has the potential to generate the necessary momentum for the stock to maintain a market cap of over $3 trillion.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eApple\u0026#39;s path to a $3 trillion market cap has been challenging, but its ability to adapt and persevere has solidified their position as a leader in the tech industry.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eWith strong momentum, consistent performance, and potential support from the 20 SMA, Apple is poised to not only reach the $3 trillion mark again, but also maintain it.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAfter the closing bell on Friday, July\u0026nbsp;7, the stock closed at $190.68, trading down by 0.59%.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n ","symbols":["AAPL"],"source":"benzinga"}]

With a projected 10% year-over-year first-party Prime Day sales growth and a 14% third-party sales growth, BofA anticipates a total GMV of $11.95 billion for Prime Day.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe shopping event is expected to account for a considerable 7.4% of GMV for the quarter, showing a slight increase from 7.2% last year. Though, it\u0026#8217;s worth noting that Prime Day usually impacts daily sales slightly negatively in the days surrounding the event.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eBut what really sets Prime Day apart this year is Amazon\u0026#8217;s transition to a regionalized logistics network. The upgrade, as pointed out by Jassy, enables the fastest Prime deliveries ever. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eCoupled with more merchant participation and steep discounts, Amazon is expected to have a relatively strong Prime Day, possibly even exceeding BofA\u0026#8217;s 12% growth estimate compared to Prime Day last year.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAhead of the event, Amazon has already started posting deals on its site, including a discount on the Amazon 43-inch Omni 4K Fire TV, available for $99.99 after requesting an invite to buy. [{"T":"n","id":33169350,"headline":"Mercedes Benz Is The Latest Automaker To Join Tesla\u0026#39;s Charging Team","summary":"On Friday, Mercedes-Benz announced it is the latest automaker to provide its EV drivers with access to Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) superchargers as of next year, or more precisely, more than 12,000 Tesla supercharger stations across North America, committing to fully adopt the company’s charging standard i","author":"Upwallstreet","created_at":"2023-07-10T15:49:49Z","updated_at":"2023-07-10T15:49:49Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/23/07/33169350/mercedes-benz-is-the-latest-automaker-to-join-teslas-charging-team","content":"\u003cp\u003eOn Friday, Mercedes-Benz announced it is the latest automaker to provide its EV drivers with access to Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSLA#NASDAQ\"\u003eTSLA\u003c/a\u003e)\u0026nbsp;superchargers as of next year, or more precisely,\u0026nbsp;more than 12,000 Tesla supercharger stations\u0026nbsp;across North America, committing to fully adopt the company\u0026rsquo;s charging standard in 2025. Following the footsteps of Ford Motor (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/F#NYSE\"\u003eF\u003c/a\u003e), General Motors (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GM#NYSE\"\u003eGM\u003c/a\u003e), Rivian Automotive Inc (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/RIVN#NASDAQ\"\u003eRIVN\u003c/a\u003e) and Volvo Car (OTC:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/VLVLY#OTC\"\u003eVLVLY\u003c/a\u003e), Mercedes said it\u0026rsquo;s the first German manufacturer to adopt Tesla\u0026rsquo;s charging plug, the NACS ports, and install it in its future EVs. Reportedly, Mercedes\u0026rsquo; German peer, Volkswagen (OTC:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/VWAGY#OTC\"\u003eVWAGY\u003c/a\u003e) is also in talks to adopt the Tesla-developed charging technology. As for Mercedes vehicles made before 2025 with the Combined Charging System, it will be offering a plug-in adapter as of 2024.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eWith Mercedes-Benz on its side, Tesla is another step closer to changing the EV industry standard.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eMercedes Continues To Build Its Own Charging Network\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eBy the end of the decade, Mercedes will be building 2,000\u003cstrong\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/strong\u003echarging hubs that will be accessible for a \u0026ldquo;wide range\u0026rdquo; of EV owners. \u0026nbsp;North America charging network will expand by 400 of these, followed by Europe and China. With the North American High-Power Charging Network, Andrew Cornelia, CEO of Mercedes-Benz HPC North America stated that the automaker is set to redefine the EV charging experience.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eAutomakers Have Realized The Importance Of Making Owning EVs Easier\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThese arrangements are a clear acknowledgment of Tesla\u0026rsquo;s lead and know-how on the EV charging front. But, when it comes to sales, the race is still very much ongoing even though Tesla continues to ramp up production and sales growing 30% YoY during the first half of the year as its Texas facility came into life. General Motors has been criticized for not kicking its EV game into high gear but the automaker was constrained by domestic battery production taking longer than expected. Despite its disappointing EV output, General Motors is still determined to catch up to Tesla. CEO Mary Bara is aiming to do so by mid-decade with more mainstream EV launches that will kick off later this year, as well as a new electric delivery van and a bespoke Cadillac EV. GM plans to bring 150,000 EVs to life for the U.S market. But, during the first half of the year, it was run over by Hyundai in U.S. EV sales and ended third.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eFord fell even harder, from second to fifth place as it had some downtime due to retooling its Mustang Mach-E, facility to be able to boost EV production. As a result, its EV sales rose only 12% compared to last year\u0026rsquo;s period. However, these are one-time setbacks and these legacy Detroit automakers are undoubtedly gearing up and will be fighting Tesla for EV leadership sometime in the future.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eEven Tesla Does Not Have A\u0026nbsp;Clear Road Ahead\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eDespite record quarterly performance on July 2nd with its second quarter results, even Tesla is facing setbacks and this time, they are of regulatory nature. Back in March, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration opened an investigation due to concern that steering wheels were coming off while driving 100,000 Tesla best sellers, namely the 2023 Model Y SUVs. This was certainly not the only equipment recall this year. May, Chinese regulators pressured Tesla into recalling about 1.1 million vehicles for a software update that allowed changes to braking methods as well as more warnings about accelerator pedals usage. Back in February, Tesla recalled 362,758 Model S, Model X, Model 3 and Model Y EVs due to a safety update for its Full Self-Driving feature. Now, InsideEVs reported that the NHTSA has reopened its Tesla investigation that was previously closed in 2021, and that includes approximately 1.8 million EVs sold in the US, including Model S, Model X, Model 3 and Model Y. The issue in question is a design flaw that reportedly results in sudden unintended acceleration problem. Despite Musk\u0026rsquo;s flamboyant nature and responses that NHTSA\u0026rsquo;s sayings are \u0026lsquo;flat-out-wrong\u0026rsquo;, NHTSA has the final say on the regulatory front.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eDISCLAIMER: This content is for informational purposes only. It is not intended as investing advice.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n ","symbols":["F","GM","RIVN","TSLA","VLVLY","VWAGY"],"source":"benzinga"}]
[{"T":"n","id":33169350,"headline":"Mercedes Benz Is The Latest Automaker To Join Tesla\u0026#39;s Charging Team","summary":"On Friday, Mercedes-Benz announced it is the latest automaker to provide its EV drivers with access to Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) superchargers as of next year, or more precisely, more than 12,000 Tesla supercharger stations across North America, committing to fully adopt the company’s charging standard i","author":"Upwallstreet","created_at":"2023-07-10T15:49:49Z","updated_at":"2023-07-10T15:51:06Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/23/07/33169350/mercedes-benz-is-the-latest-automaker-to-join-teslas-charging-team","content":"\u003cp\u003eOn Friday, Mercedes-Benz announced it is the latest automaker to provide its EV drivers with access to Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSLA#NASDAQ\"\u003eTSLA\u003c/a\u003e)\u0026nbsp;superchargers as of next year, or more precisely,\u0026nbsp;more than 12,000 Tesla supercharger stations\u0026nbsp;across North America, committing to fully adopt the company\u0026rsquo;s charging standard in 2025. Following the footsteps of Ford Motor (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/F#NYSE\"\u003eF\u003c/a\u003e), General Motors (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GM#NYSE\"\u003eGM\u003c/a\u003e), Rivian Automotive Inc (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/RIVN#NASDAQ\"\u003eRIVN\u003c/a\u003e) and Volvo Car (OTC:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/VLVLY#OTC\"\u003eVLVLY\u003c/a\u003e), Mercedes said it\u0026rsquo;s the first German manufacturer to adopt Tesla\u0026rsquo;s charging plug, the NACS ports, and install it in its future EVs. Reportedly, Mercedes\u0026rsquo; German peer, Volkswagen (OTC:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/VWAGY#OTC\"\u003eVWAGY\u003c/a\u003e) is also in talks to adopt the Tesla-developed charging technology. As for Mercedes vehicles made before 2025 with the Combined Charging System, it will be offering a plug-in adapter as of 2024.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eWith Mercedes-Benz on its side, Tesla is another step closer to changing the EV industry standard.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eMercedes Continues To Build Its Own Charging Network\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eBy the end of the decade, Mercedes will be building 2,000\u003cstrong\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/strong\u003echarging hubs that will be accessible for a \u0026ldquo;wide range\u0026rdquo; of EV owners. \u0026nbsp;North America charging network will expand by 400 of these, followed by Europe and China. With the North American High-Power Charging Network, Andrew Cornelia, CEO of Mercedes-Benz HPC North America stated that the automaker is set to redefine the EV charging experience.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003ch3\u003eAutomakers Have Realized The Importance Of Making Owning EVs Easier\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThese arrangements are a clear acknowledgment of Tesla\u0026rsquo;s lead and know-how on the EV charging front. But, when it comes to sales, the race is still very much ongoing even though Tesla continues to ramp up production and sales growing 30% YoY during the first half of the year as its Texas facility came into life. General Motors has been criticized for not kicking its EV game into high gear but the automaker was constrained by domestic battery production taking longer than expected. Despite its disappointing EV output, General Motors is still determined to catch up to Tesla. CEO Mary Bara is aiming to do so by mid-decade with more mainstream EV launches that will kick off later this year, as well as a new electric delivery van and a bespoke Cadillac EV. The broad array of discounted items, as Jassy In said \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/large-cap/23/07/33141588/amazon-ceo-andy-jassy-on-chinese-competition-prime-day-and-more\"\u003eon CNBC\u003c/a\u003e, will be made available not just on Amazon.com but also through third-party merchants participating in the new \"Buy with Prime\" feature.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe move is set to allow direct-to-consumer shipping off of merchants\u0026#8217; own websites.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eNoteworthy deals during Prime Day include: \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cul\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e60% off \u003cstrong\u003eGap Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GPS#NYSE\"\u003eGPS\u003c/a\u003e) clothing\u003c/li\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cli\u003e50% off \u003cstrong\u003eSony Group Corp\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/SONY#NYSE\"\u003eSONY\u003c/a\u003e) headphones\u003c/li\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cli\u003eBissell vacuums\u003c/li\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cli\u003e40% off on \u003cstrong\u003ePeloton Interactive Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/PTON#NASDAQ\"\u003ePTON\u003c/a\u003e) Bike and Bike+.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Also: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33118426/you-can-grab-the-airpods-pro-2nd-gen-with-50-discount-ahead-of-prime-day-sale\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003eYou Can Grab The AirPods Pro 2nd Gen With $50 Discount Ahead Of Prime Day Sale\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eFirst-party Amazon and Alexa items, including the 43\" Fire TV Omni Series, Fire TV Stick (3rd Gen), Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen), Ring Indoor Cam (2nd Gen), Kindle Scribe, and the new Fire Max 11 tablet, are also featured with discounts up to 75%.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003ePost estimates that Prime Day could generate around $12 billion in Gross Merchandise Volume (GMV). With a projected 10% year-over-year first-party Prime Day sales growth and a 14% third-party sales growth, BofA anticipates a total GMV of $11.95 billion for Prime Day.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe shopping event is expected to account for a considerable 7.4% of GMV for the quarter, showing a slight increase from 7.2% last year. Though, it\u0026#8217;s worth noting that Prime Day usually impacts daily sales slightly negatively in the days surrounding the event.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eBut what really sets Prime Day apart this year is Amazon\u0026#8217;s transition to a regionalized logistics network. The upgrade, as pointed out by Jassy, enables the fastest Prime deliveries ever. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eCoupled with more merchant participation and steep discounts, Amazon is expected to have a relatively strong Prime Day, possibly even exceeding BofA\u0026#8217;s 12% growth estimate compared to Prime Day last year.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAhead of the event, Amazon has already started posting deals on its site, including a discount on the Amazon 43-inch Omni 4K Fire TV, available for $99.99 after requesting an invite to buy. More to that, dozens of deals on Alexa-powered devices starting from $12 have already gone live.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAmazon is set to deliver an array of deals across all categories, including consumer electronics, home items, kitchen appliances, apparel, and toys, ensuring a retail event that caters to all shopping preferences and budgets.\u003cbr\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33144544/how-amazons-ceo-plans-to-dominate-the-ai-race-against-microsoft-and-google\"\u003eHow Amazon\u0026#8217;s CEO Plans To Dominate The AI Race Against Microsoft And Google?\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["AMZN","BAC","GPS","PTON","SONY"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":33169074,"headline":"Amazon Set For Record-Breaking Prime Day Despite Economic Frugality","summary":" ","author":"AJ Fabino","created_at":"2023-07-10T15:35:38Z","updated_at":"2023-07-10T15:57:01Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/analyst-ratings/analyst-color/23/07/33169074/amazon-set-for-record-breaking-prime-day-despite-economic-frugality","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAmazon.com Inc,\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/AMZN#NASDAQ\"\u003eAMZN\u003c/a\u003e) is set for its annual Prime Day event, with CEO \u003cstrong\u003eAndy Jassy\u003c/strong\u003e promising a shopping spree unlike any the \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/topic/prime-day\"\u003eSeattle-based company has hosted\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eScheduled to run from 3 a.m. ET on July 11 to the same time on July 12, the retail rush promises \u0026#8220;more deals than any past Prime Day,\u0026#8221; with a fresh set of deals dropping every half an hour during certain periods.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAccording to \u003cstrong\u003eBank of America Corp\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/BAC#NYSE\"\u003eBAC\u003c/a\u003e) analyst \u003cstrong\u003eJustin Post\u003c/strong\u003e, the event\u0026#8217;s timing couldn\u0026#8217;t be more perfect as several retailers, including Amazon, have observed that consumers have become more cost-conscious in 2023.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eJassy hinted at the novelties planned for this year\u0026#8217;s event. The broad array of discounted items, as Jassy In said \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/large-cap/23/07/33141588/amazon-ceo-andy-jassy-on-chinese-competition-prime-day-and-more\"\u003eon CNBC\u003c/a\u003e, will be made available not just on Amazon.com but also through third-party merchants participating in the new \"Buy with Prime\" feature.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe move is set to allow direct-to-consumer shipping off of merchants\u0026#8217; own websites.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eNoteworthy deals during Prime Day include: \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cul\u003e\n\u003cli\u003e60% off \u003cstrong\u003eGap Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/GPS#NYSE\"\u003eGPS\u003c/a\u003e) clothing\u003c/li\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cli\u003e50% off \u003cstrong\u003eSony Group Corp\u003c/strong\u003e (NYSE:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/SONY#NYSE\"\u003eSONY\u003c/a\u003e) headphones\u003c/li\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cli\u003eBissell vacuums\u003c/li\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cli\u003e40% off on \u003cstrong\u003ePeloton Interactive Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/PTON#NASDAQ\"\u003ePTON\u003c/a\u003e) Bike and Bike+.\u003c/li\u003e\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Also: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33118426/you-can-grab-the-airpods-pro-2nd-gen-with-50-discount-ahead-of-prime-day-sale\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003eYou Can Grab The AirPods Pro 2nd Gen With $50 Discount Ahead Of Prime Day Sale\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eFirst-party Amazon and Alexa items, including the 43\" Fire TV Omni Series, Fire TV Stick (3rd Gen), Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen), Ring Indoor Cam (2nd Gen), Kindle Scribe, and the new Fire Max 11 tablet, are also featured with discounts up to 75%.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003ePost estimates that Prime Day could generate around $12 billion in Gross Merchandise Volume (GMV). With a projected 10% year-over-year first-party Prime Day sales growth and a 14% third-party sales growth, BofA anticipates a total GMV of $11.95 billion for Prime Day.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe shopping event is expected to account for a considerable 7.4% of GMV for the quarter, showing a slight increase from 7.2% last year. Though, it\u0026#8217;s worth noting that Prime Day usually impacts daily sales slightly negatively in the days surrounding the event.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eBut what really sets Prime Day apart this year is Amazon\u0026#8217;s transition to a regionalized logistics network. The upgrade, as pointed out by Jassy, enables the fastest Prime deliveries ever. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eCoupled with more merchant participation and steep discounts, Amazon is expected to have a relatively strong Prime Day, possibly even exceeding BofA\u0026#8217;s 12% growth estimate compared to Prime Day last year.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAhead of the event, Amazon has already started posting deals on its site, including a discount on the Amazon 43-inch Omni 4K Fire TV, available for $99.99 after requesting an invite to buy. More to that, dozens of deals on Alexa-powered devices starting from $12 have already gone live.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAmazon is set to deliver an array of deals across all categories, including consumer electronics, home items, kitchen appliances, apparel, and toys, ensuring a retail event that caters to all shopping preferences and budgets.\u003cbr\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33144544/how-amazons-ceo-plans-to-dominate-the-ai-race-against-microsoft-and-google\"\u003eHow Amazon\u0026#8217;s CEO Plans To Dominate The AI Race Against Microsoft And Google?\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["AMZN","BAC","GPS","PTON","SONY"],"source":"benzinga"}]

As leaders of some of the world\u0026#8217;s most influential tech companies, their public clashes could have implications for their businesses and reputations.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe ongoing feud also adds to the narrative about the increasing tension among tech industry leaders.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eThe Question Remains: \u003c/strong\u003eWill there be a cage match, or even a less traditional contest as Musk suggested? platform.\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIn 2023, the actor made a foray into the world of writing, and despite his demanding schedule, he adopted a productivity technique to \u0026ldquo;Forrest Gump,\u0026rdquo;\u003c/a\u003e many saw his writing skills put to the test for the first\u0026nbsp;this year.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eHanks released his debut novel, \u0026ldquo;The Making of Another Major Motion Picture Masterpiece,\u0026rdquo; in May 2023.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIn this 448-page book, Hanks takes readers \u003ca href=\"http://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/599504/the-making-of-another-major-motion-picture-masterpiece-by-tom-hanks/\"\u003ethrough\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u0026ldquo;the making of a star-studded, multimillion-dollar superhero action film\u0026hellip;and the humble comic books that inspired it.\u0026rdquo;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe book released by Penguin Random House became a New York Times bestseller after its release.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eGiven his busy schedule and lack of professional writing experience, Hanks utilized a production method known as the Pomodoro Technique to complete the novel.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eHanks said in an \u003ca href=\"https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2023/06/tom-hanks-making-motion-picture-book-interview/673783/\"\u003einterview \u003c/a\u003ewith The Atlantic that he utilized the Pomodoro Technique, a time-management and productivity tool, to complete his novel.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRelated Link: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/general/entertainment/23/01/30654828/the-rise-of-artificial-intelligence-in-movies-how-the-tom-cruise-deepfake-company-is-helpin\"\u003eThe Rise Of Artificial Intelligence In Movies, How Tom Hanks Is Involved\u0026nbsp;\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat is the Pomodoro Method and How You Can Use It: \u003c/strong\u003eDeveloped in the 1980s by \u003cstrong\u003eFrancesco Cirillo, \u003c/strong\u003ethe Pomodoro Method is one of many productivity tools that people can use when writing, studying or seeking to complete a task.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAccording to \u003ca href=\"https://todoist.com/productivity-methods/pomodoro-technique\"\u003eTodoist\u003c/a\u003e, the steps of the Pomodoro Method are:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003col\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eWrite a to-do list and get a timer\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eSet the timer for 25 minutes and focus on a single task until the timer runs out\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eWhen the timer runs out, mark off a pomodoro and record what was completed\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\t\u003cli\u003eTake a five-minute break\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ol\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAfter four pomodoros and breaks (2 hours), take a 15-minute to 30-minute break.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAlthough the Pomodoro Technique is typically applied to shorter tasks, it\u0026#39;s also beneficial in breaking down larger projects like book writing into more manageable segments.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAccording to the Pomodoro Technique\u0026#39;s guidelines, a user must remain focused on the designated tasks for the entire 25-minute duration. This commitment includes refraining from distractions such as checking emails or text messages.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe twenty-five-minute intervals are called \u0026ldquo;pomodoros,\u0026rdquo; named after the tomato-shaped timer that Cirillo used.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAlong with using the Pomodoro Method to write his novel, Hanks also used the same productivity strategy to write the fictional script of \u0026ldquo;Motion Picture Masterpiece,\u0026rdquo; which is used in the plot of the book.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eHanks told The Atlantic that he wanted to write his novel as a way to give himself another creative outlet.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;I just do writing,\u0026rdquo; Hanks said. \u0026ldquo;I write because I\u0026rsquo;ve got too many f\u0026#x2A;\u0026#x2A;\u0026#x2A;ing stories in my head. And it\u0026rsquo;s fun.\u0026rdquo;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eOn \u003ca href=\"https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000158/\"\u003eIMDb\u003c/a\u003e, Hanks has 96 acting roles, 62 producer roles, seven writer roles, and seven director roles listed from his decades of film experience.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIf the Pomodoro Method is good enough for a legendary actor like Hanks, it might be worth trying for others struggling to focus or get tasks done in specific time requirements.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead Next: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/general/entertainment/22/07/27979432/youve-got-a-friend-in-me-woody-supports-best-friend-buzz-lightyear-in-tom-hanks-interview\"\u003eYou\u0026#39;ve Got A Friend In Me: Woody Supports Best Friend Buzz Lightyear In Tom Hanks Interview\u0026nbsp;\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eThis story is part of a series of features on the subject of success,\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/topic/benzinga-inspire\" target=\"_blank\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e\u003cem\u003eBenzinga Inspire\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003ePhoto: Shutterstock\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n","symbols":["AAPL"],"source":"benzinga"}]

[{"T":"n","id":33200386,"headline":"Did Elon Musk Have A Secret Glass House Project In Texas? New Report Looks Into Project 42","summary":"With a wealth of $239 billion, Elon Musk is the richest person in the world. Despite his large wealth, Musk has previously spoken out about material possessions and sold several houses he owned.","author":"Chris Katje","created_at":"2023-07-12T16:31:49Z","updated_at":"2023-07-12T16:31:49Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33200386/did-elon-musk-have-a-secret-glass-house-project-in-texas-new-report-looks-into-project-42","content":"\u003cp\u003eWith a wealth of $239 billion, \u003cstrong\u003eElon Musk \u003c/strong\u003eis the richest person in the world. Despite his large wealth, Musk has previously spoken out about material possessions and \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/21/06/21714362/did-billionaire-elon-musk-sell-all-his-mansions-to-live-in-a-50-000-house\"\u003esold several houses he owned.\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eA new report and internal probe showed a glass house may have been under construction for Musk in Texas.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat Happened:\u003c/strong\u003e In 2021, Musk-led \u003cstrong\u003eTesla Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSLA#NASDAQ\"\u003eTSLA\u003c/a\u003e) made headlines when the company announced it was moving its headquarters to Texas. Musk later announced a \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/tech/20/12/18702347/elon-musk-moves-to-texas-california-has-been-winning-for-too-long\"\u003esimilar move for himself.\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAfter selling houses he owned, Musk\u0026nbsp;publicly said he lives in a $50,000 tiny home in Texas and referenced couch surfing at friends\u0026rsquo; houses due to being without a large home.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAn internal probe by Tesla is looking into the secretive \u003cstrong\u003e\u0026ldquo;Project 42\u0026rdquo; project\u003c/strong\u003e, which was\u0026nbsp;to develop a large glass building. As \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/a-glass-house-for-elon-musk-sparks-internal-tesla-probe-9a121db5?mod=hp_lead_pos5\"\u003ereported \u003c/a\u003eby The Wall Street Journal, \u0026ldquo;Project 42\u0026rdquo; is rumored to be a house for Musk, located in Texas, near the Tesla headquarters.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026ldquo;Project 42\u0026rdquo; had plans that called for a twisted hexagon-shaped building located on the waterfront with Tesla\u0026rsquo;s Gigafactory in the background. The document with plans for the house was reviewed by the WSJ.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe report said the design plans for the glass building include bedrooms, bathrooms and a kitchen, according to sources.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAnother source said a waterfall was part of the landscaping in design pictures along with a pickup truck that resembled the upcoming Cybertruck.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eEmployees at Tesla have been working on the project since last year, according to the report.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eTesla board members have been prying into the project to see if the secretive building has been misusing company funds. \u003cstrong\u003eA large purchase for specialized glass, which came with a cost of millions of dollars, is said to have sparked the investigation.\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe glass purchase came as Tesla has previously said in securities filings that its audit committee has to approve transactions above $120,000 that include the involvement of an executive, such as Musk, having a material interest.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eLawyers and Tesla board members are now investigating to see what funds were used, what the building is and whether Musk has a role in the project. The investigation is also looking into if employees were used for the project and spent time on it over other company obligations.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe Wall Street Journal said the outcome of the investigation is not known at this time.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eBenzinga reached out to Tesla for comment and will update the story accordingly.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRelated Link:\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/22/08/28403353/exclusive-boxabl-founder-discusses-selling-50k-house-to-elon-musk-huge-wait-list-and-if-we-could-see\"\u003eExclusive: Tiny Home Builder Boxabl [{"T":"n","id":33202228,"headline":"Elon Musk Quietly Launches xAI Amid Bid To Decode Universe","summary":" ","author":"AJ Fabino","created_at":"2023-07-12T16:55:45Z","updated_at":"2023-07-12T16:55:45Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33202228/elon-musk-quietly-launches-xai-amid-bid-to-decode-universe","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eElon Musk\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026#8216;s newest venture, \u003cstrong\u003exAI\u003c/strong\u003e, seeks to \u003ca href=\"https://x.ai/\"\u003e\"understand the true nature of the universe.\"\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat Happened:\u003c/strong\u003e Musk, who runs both \u003cstrong\u003eTesla Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSLA#NASDAQ\"\u003eTSLA\u003c/a\u003e) and \u003cstrong\u003eSpaceX\u003c/strong\u003e, leads the team at xAI.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe startup\u0026#8217;s team members include workers from \u003cstrong\u003eDeepMind\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eOpenAI\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eGoogle Research\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eMicrosoft Research\u003c/strong\u003e, Tesla, and \u003cstrong\u003ethe University of Toronto\u003c/strong\u003e. Among them are \u003cstrong\u003eIgor Babuschkin\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eManuel Kroiss\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eYuhuai Wu\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eChristian Szegedy\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eJimmy Ba\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eToby Pohlen\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eRoss Nordeen\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eKyle Kosic\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eGreg Yang\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eGuodong Zhang\u003c/strong\u003e, and \u003cstrong\u003eZihang Dai\u003c/strong\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eDan Hendrycks\u003c/strong\u003e, current director of the Center for AI Safety, will serve in an advisory role.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eDespite xAI being a separate entity, it will closely cooperate with \u003cstrong\u003eX Corp\u003c/strong\u003e, Tesla, and other companies.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe company also launched an official Twitter account in May, \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/xai\"\u003e@xai\u003c/a\u003e, with 6,870 followers at the time of writing.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead also: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32956523/tesla-quietly-launches-new-tesla-ai-twitter-account-heres-its-first-thread\"\u003eTesla Quietly Launches New Tesla AI Twitter Account: Here\u0026#8217;s Its First Thread\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe choice of the name xAI refers to one of Musk\u0026#8217;s earliest endeavors, \u003cstrong\u003eX.com\u003c/strong\u003e. The website was one of the pioneering online banking sites founded in December 1999. It eventually merged with \u003cstrong\u003ePayPal Holdings Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/PYPL#NASDAQ\"\u003ePYPL\u003c/a\u003e) — a company Musk also co-founded — in March 2000 and later spun off into an independent entity. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eMusk regained ownership of the domain name X.com from PayPal in 2017.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe new venture from Musk isn\u0026#8217;t surprising for those who have been closely following his trajectory.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eIn April, he hinted at his AI ambitions in an interview with former Fox News host \u003cstrong\u003eTucker Carlson\u003c/strong\u003e. Musk spoke about creating a \u0026#8220;Truth GPT,\u0026#8221; or a maximum truth-seeking AI, that attempts to comprehend the nature of the universe.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eMusk has also expressed his concern about the potential dangers of AI, \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/04/31845988/elon-musk-is-worried-about-ai-posing-a-threat-to-humanity-but-prepares-to-launch-openai-rival\"\u003estressing the need for safety standards and an understanding of AI\u0026#8217;s potential\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eWith the creation of xAI, Musk is set to compete against OpenAI, a company he left in 2018.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe team said it will be hosting a Twitter Spaces chat on Friday, July 14.\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-rich is-provider-twitter wp-block-embed-twitter\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\"\u003e\n\u003cblockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"500\" data-dnt=\"true\"\u003e\u003cp lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\"\u003eAnnouncing formation of \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/xai?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\"\u003e@xAI\u003c/a\u003e to understand reality\u003c/p\u003e\u0026mdash; Elon Musk (@elonmusk) \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1679164661869182976?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\"\u003eJuly 12, 2023\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/blockquote\u003e\u003cscript async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"\u003e\u003c/script\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e","symbols":["PYPL","TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]

they said. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003ePhoto Courtesy: Shutterstock.com\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eCheck out more of Benzinga's Future Of Mobility coverage by\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003e\u003ca target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/topic/mobility\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\"\u003e\u003cem\u003efollowing this link\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead More:\u0026nbsp;\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/strong\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33155400/elon-musk-takes-tesla-cybertruck-for-a-spin-in-austin-shares-photo\"\u003eElon Musk Takes Tesla Cybertruck For A Spin In Austin, Shares Photo\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","symbols":["CEO","TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]
[{"T":"n","id":33202228,"headline":"Elon Musk Goes From Co-Founding OpenAI To Creating xAI, Seeking To \u0026#39;Understand Reality\u0026#39;","summary":" ","author":"AJ Fabino","created_at":"2023-07-12T16:55:31Z","updated_at":"2023-07-12T17:03:48Z","url":"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/07/33202228/elon-musk-quietly-launches-xai-amid-bid-to-decode-universe","content":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eElon Musk\u003c/strong\u003e\u0026#8216;s newest venture, \u003cstrong\u003exAI\u003c/strong\u003e, seeks to \"understand the true nature of the universe,\u0026#8221; according to a website for the company that launched Wednesday. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhat Happened:\u003c/strong\u003e Musk, who runs both \u003cstrong\u003eTesla Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/TSLA#NASDAQ\"\u003eTSLA\u003c/a\u003e) and \u003cstrong\u003eSpaceX\u003c/strong\u003e, leads the team at xAI.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe startup\u0026#8217;s team members include workers from \u003cstrong\u003eDeepMind\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eOpenAI\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eGoogle Research\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eMicrosoft Research\u003c/strong\u003e, Tesla, and \u003cstrong\u003ethe University of Toronto\u003c/strong\u003e. Among them are \u003cstrong\u003eIgor Babuschkin\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eManuel Kroiss\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eYuhuai Wu\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eChristian Szegedy\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eJimmy Ba\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eToby Pohlen\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eRoss Nordeen\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eKyle Kosic\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eGreg Yang\u003c/strong\u003e, \u003cstrong\u003eGuodong Zhang\u003c/strong\u003e, and \u003cstrong\u003eZihang Dai\u003c/strong\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eDan Hendrycks\u003c/strong\u003e, current director of the Center for AI Safety, will serve in an advisory role.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eDespite xAI being a separate entity, it will closely cooperate with \u003cstrong\u003eX Corp\u003c/strong\u003e, Tesla, and other companies, according to the website.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe company also launched an official Twitter account in May, \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/xai\"\u003e@xai\u003c/a\u003e, with 82,500 followers at the time of writing.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eRead also: \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/06/32956523/tesla-quietly-launches-new-tesla-ai-twitter-account-heres-its-first-thread\"\u003eTesla Quietly Launches New Tesla AI Twitter Account: Here\u0026#8217;s Its First Thread\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe choice of the name xAI refers to one of Musk\u0026#8217;s earliest endeavors, \u003cstrong\u003eX.com\u003c/strong\u003e. The website was one of the pioneering online banking sites founded in December 1999. It eventually merged with \u003cstrong\u003ePayPal Holdings Inc\u003c/strong\u003e (NASDAQ:\u003ca class=\"ticker\" href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/stock/PYPL#NASDAQ\"\u003ePYPL\u003c/a\u003e) — a company Musk also co-founded — in March 2000 and later spun off into an independent entity. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eMusk regained ownership of the domain name X.com from PayPal in 2017.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eWhy It\u0026#8217;s Important:\u003c/strong\u003e The new venture from Musk isn\u0026#8217;t surprising for those who have been closely following his trajectory.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eIn April, he hinted at his AI ambitions in an interview with former Fox News host \u003cstrong\u003eTucker Carlson\u003c/strong\u003e. Musk spoke about creating a \u0026#8220;Truth GPT,\u0026#8221; or a maximum truth-seeking AI, that attempts to comprehend the nature of the universe.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eMusk has also expressed his concern about the potential dangers of AI, \u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/news/23/04/31845988/elon-musk-is-worried-about-ai-posing-a-threat-to-humanity-but-prepares-to-launch-openai-rival\"\u003estressing the need for safety standards and an understanding of AI\u0026#8217;s potential\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eWith the creation of xAI, Musk is set to compete against \u003cstrong\u003eOpenAI\u003c/strong\u003e, a company he left in 2018.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe xAi website announced a Twitter Spaces chat on Friday, July 14.\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-rich is-provider-twitter wp-block-embed-twitter\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\"\u003e\n\u003cblockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"500\" data-dnt=\"true\"\u003e\u003cp lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\"\u003eAnnouncing formation of \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/xai?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\"\u003e@xAI\u003c/a\u003e to understand reality\u003c/p\u003e\u0026mdash; Elon Musk (@elonmusk) \u003ca href=\"https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1679164661869182976?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\"\u003eJuly 12, 2023\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/blockquote\u003e\u003cscript async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"\u003e\u003c/script\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e","symbols":["PYPL","TSLA"],"source":"benzinga"}]

\u003ca href=\"https://www.benzinga.com/government/23/01/30260466/10-best-stock-traders-in-congress-in-2022-spoiler-nancy-pelosi-isnt-no-1\"\u003e10 Best Stock Traders In Congress In
